B00SK71SAG.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Body > Cleansers > Body Washes
B00SK71SAG.description: Having sensitive skin can be really…irritating. Making you wary of harsh ingredients that could trigger it. We get it! Our rich and creamy, hypoallergenic Dove Sensitive Skin Body Wash is here to wash away those concerns and leave you with soft, healthy-looking, and happy skin. The only reaction you can expect is a radiant, glowing review from your skin. It’s full of millions of teeny tiny 24hr Renewing MicroMoisture droplets and plant-based moisturizers that gently cleanse and deeply nourish for skin that’s renewed and soft as silk. It’s a body wash that’s everything you need without the things you don’t. Like no sulfates and no parabens. Only green flags here to make sure your sensitive skin won’t be seeing red. Our hypoallergenic formula hypes up hydration and soothes dryness without irritation. That’s why it’s the No.1 dermatologist-recommended brand. And we all know a derm is a sensitive skin wearer’s best friend. To use this rich, creamy body wash, squeeze into palms or loofah, massage onto skin, rinse, and step out of the shower feeling hydrated and renewed. Our Sensitive Skin Body Wash is vegan and Dove is PETA approved, meaning we do not test on animals anywhere in the world. Plus, it’s sulfate-free, paraben-free, and packaged in 100% recycled bottles.

B0DLKCCPYZ.product_name: COSRX Pink Peptides Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles, Under Eye Mask, 60 Under Eye Patches, Korean Skin Care
B0DLKCCPYZ.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Eyes > Masks
B0DLKCCPYZ.description:
Say goodbye to puffiness and hello to youthful eyes!: The Peptide Collagen Eye Patches, enriched with 4 powerful peptides and collagen, work to reduce puffiness, hydrate, and revitalize your under-eye area, leaving your skin looking refreshed and radiant.
Clinically Tested: Based on Clinical Tests, the Patches were confirmed to help reduce puffiness by 25%, improve hydration by 68%, and improve firmness by 17% on the under eyes with one use. *Eye Irritation and Sensitive Skin Irritation Tested.
Key Ingredients: 4 Peptides, Collagen, Caffeine, Niacinamide, Adenosine, Hyaluronic Acid, and Cyanocobalamin work together to help firm, depuff and provide volume to the under eyes.
How to Use: On clean, dry skin, place the gel eye patches under your eyes and leave on for about 10 minutes. Gently remove, then pat any remaining essence into the skin until fully absorbed. Two ways Usage : 1. Under-eye puffiness & wrinkles : Place the large round end towards your nose. 2. Crow's feet : Place the large round away from your nose.*Tips for Applying: Remove excess essence to prevent from slipping, and gently press patches to secure in place.
Patch Test Recommended: Perform a Patch Test on the body before using on the face. Proceed to using on the face if no irritation occurs in 24 hours. Consult with your doctor immediately if irritation occurs.

B0FJSNWNLW.product_name: grace & stella Under Eye Brightener with Cooling Metal Rollerball - Ceramide & Caffeine Eye Serum for Puffy Eyes - Travel Size Toiletries - Vegan Skincare (15ml / 0.51floz)

B0FJSNWNLW.description:
Cooling Essential: Love our cooling eye elixir? Meet our cooling eye serum roller - retinol-free and perfect for daytime! With soothing actives and a metal rollerball, it helps to refresh your under eye bags and revive tired-looking under eyes.
Daily Wake-Up Call: Bring dull, fatigued under eyes back to life with this eye roller. With caffeine & niacinamide, this helps diminish the look of dark circles and dullness for a brighter, more radiant appearance over time.
Calm, Cool Hydration: Our caffeine eye serum keeps under-eyes moisturized with hyaluronic acid & ceramide, while soothing sensitive skin with centella asiatica. Hydration helps soften the look of fine lines over time & keeps skin fresh and youthful.

Loved By Millions: From beauty editors to celebs, grace & stella is the life of the skincare party. This grace and stella eye roller makes a thoughtful self-care gift for any occasion, from birthdays, holidays, and bachelorette parties.

B0010ED5FC.product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Massage Lotion For Stretch Marks, Pregnancy Skin Care, Belly Cream with Collagen, Elastin, Argan OIl and Shea Butter, 8.5 Ounces
B0010ED5FC.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Maternity
B0010ED5FC.description: Nine out of ten pregnant women develop stretch marks at some point in their pregnancy. And aside from the belly, thighs, hips, breasts, and buttocks can all show signs of stretching. The cause? The collagen and elastin fibers that keep your skin firm and tight stretch and tear due to the pregnancy hormones and the pressure on your body from the rapid weight gain. While you can’t prevent stretch marks, you can help reduce their appearance with the support from Palmer's. Whatever product you choose - whether it's a stretch mark cream, a stretch mark oil, or a stretch mark lotion, natural cocoa butter is safe to use on your body while pregnant and helps reduce stretch marks as you and your baby grow. Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Massage Lotion helps visibly improve skin elasticity and reduce the appearance of stretch marks. Pure Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Natural Oils, Collagen, Elastin, and Lutein keep skin moisturized and supple for 48 hours. A pregnancy must have, this everyday body lotion is widely recommended for stretch marks during and after pregnancy. This non-greasy lotion is ideal for all over body use, in place of your regular skin moisturizer. Proudly made in U.S.A.
features: Stretch Mark Lotion: This non-greasy deep moisturizing body lotion is ideal for all-over body use to improve skin elasticity, texture and tone and is widely recommended for stretch marks during and after pregnancy or weight fluctuation

Natural Factors: Hydrating & hypoallergenic body lotion formula blends Pure Cocoa Butter & Shea Butter, Argan Oil, Collagen, Elastin & Lutein to keep skin supple and moisturized for 48 hours, allowing skin to stretch more easily; a pregnancy must-have!

B071RCMQNG.product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Pregnancy Skin Care Kit for Stretch Marks and Scars, Dermatologist Approved, Gift for Mom to Be, 4 Piece Full Size Set
B071RCMQNG.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Maternity
B071RCMQNG.description: The statistics are remarkable—nine out of ten pregnant women develop stretch marks at some point in their pregnancy. Some women notice them as early as their first trimester, while others don't notice them until the end of their pregnancy. And stretch marks are not just limited to the belly where the baby is growing; thighs, hips, breasts, and buttocks can all show signs of stretching. The cause? The collagen and elastin fibers that keep your skin firm and tight stretch and tear due to pregnancy hormones and the pressure on your body from rapid weight gain. As an expectant mom, it's important to take care of your own health and well-being in order to give your baby the best start in life. A prenatal pregnancy regimen can help you do just that. So, along with your pregnancy pillow, prenatal vitamins, and fetal doppler, be sure to include Palmer’s Stretch Mark Care Collection to ensure your body and your skin are well taken care of throughout your pregnancy. While you can't prevent stretch marks, you can help reduce their appearance with the support from Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula's maternity skincare collection. Applying a stretch mark cream or pregnancy lotion is a popular way to treat stretchmarks. The Palmer's Complete Stretch Mark Care kit is designed specifically for pre-natal skincare, as it includes a stretch mark cream, a stretch mark lotion, a stretch mark tummy butter, and a skin therapy body oil for stretchmarks and scars. A regular on the list of pregnancy must haves, this baby registry gift for a new mom (or for yourself!), is safe to use while pregnant and helps reduce stretch marks as you and your baby grow. Proudly made in U.S.A.
features: Pregnancy Essentials: Help improve the appearance of scars and stretch marks during and after your pregnancy with this maternity skincare kit featuring a collection of pregnancy must-haves from Palmer's such as Stretch Marks Lotion or Stretch Mark Cream for Pregnancy, Tummy Butter Balm and Skin Therapy Body Oil for Stretch Marks

Pre-Natal and Post-Natal Skin Care for Stretch Marks and Scars: Made with Cocoa Butter to soften and smooth skin, Vitamin E for even and toned appearance, Collagen and Elastin for stretchability and firmness, Co Enzyme Q10 to revitalize, and Pro Vitamin B5 to soothe sore, cracked skin

Finest Ingredients: We use only the finest natural, raw ingredients for soft, hydrated and beautiful hair & skin. We support sustainable production of Shea & Cocoa Butter and Coconut Oil. You can feel good about what you put on your hair and skin

Why Palmers? For over 180 years, Palmer's has crafted treatment-oriented beauty products using Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Olive Oil & Vitamin E to soothe, hydrate, soften, replenish and revitalize skin and hair

Each patch is 8" long to cover your entire incision and is made with medical-grade silicone - the #1 Dermatologist recommendation for scar reduction treatments. Reuse each patch up to seven days + store extras in the included Extra-Patch Pouch Keep-Clean Case.
features: C-SECTION SCAR SILICONE STRIPS: Includes 6 reusable scar treatment patches to support keloid bump removal for c-section recovery and Keep-Clean Case. C-section sized patches are 8 inches long to cover the entire incision.
KELOID and HYPERTROPHIC SCARS: Treats and reduces redness plus discomfort associated with this scar type.
HYDRATING AND WATERPROOF: Patches hydrate plus protect scars to help improve their look and feel. Patches can be worn while bathing or swimming.
C-SECTION RECOVERY MUST HAVES: You earned your scar, now protect it. Reuse each patch up to seven days and store extras in your Keep-Clean Case.
DOCTOR RECOMMENDED: Medical grade silicone - the top dermatologist plus plastic surgeon choice for scar reduction treatment.

MOISTURIZES WITHOUT GREASY FEEL: This quick-dry oil hydrates & helps minimize stretch marks & scars. Crafted with mamas-to-be in mind, our oil can be used on the belly, breasts, hips, and anywhere else needing head-to-toe hydration

B08P3HSPM7.product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Massage Lotion For Stretch Marks, Pregnancy Skin Care, Belly Cream with Collagen, Elastin, Argan OIl and Shea Butter, 33.8 Ounces
B08P3HSPM7.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Maternity
B08P3HSPM7.description: Nine out of ten pregnant women develop stretch marks at some point in their pregnancy. And aside from the belly, thighs, hips, breasts, and buttocks can all show signs of stretching. The cause? The collagen and elastin fibers that keep your skin firm and tight stretch and tear due to the pregnancy hormones and the pressure on your body from the rapid weight gain. While you can’t prevent stretch marks, you can help reduce their appearance with the support from Palmer's. Whatever product you choose - whether it's a stretch mark cream, a stretch mark oil, or a stretch mark lotion, natural cocoa butter is safe to use on your body while pregnant and helps reduce stretch marks as you and your baby grow. Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Massage Lotion helps visibly improve skin elasticity and reduce the appearance of stretch marks. Pure Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Natural Oils, Collagen, Elastin, and Lutein keep skin moisturized and supple for 48 hours. A pregnancy must have, this everyday body lotion is widely recommended for stretch marks during and after pregnancy. This non-greasy lotion is ideal for all over body use, in place of your regular skin moisturizer. Proudly made in U.S.A.
features: Stretch Mark Lotion: This non-greasy deep moisturizing body lotion is ideal for all-over body use to improve skin elasticity, texture and tone and is widely recommended for stretch marks during and after pregnancy or weight fluctuation

Natural Factors: Hydrating & hypoallergenic body lotion formula blends Pure Cocoa Butter & Shea Butter, Argan Oil, Collagen, Elastin & Lutein to keep skin supple and moisturized for 48 hours, allowing skin to stretch more easily; a pregnancy must-have!

Finest Ingredients: We use only the finest natural, raw ingredients for soft, hydrated and beautiful hair & skin. We support sustainable production of Shea & Cocoa Butter and Coconut Oil. You can feel good about what you put on your hair and skin

Choose What's Real: Our nourishing skin care and hair care products feature real, high-quality, plant-based ingredients. Our product line for whole body care includes body butter, creams, balms, lotions, oils, soaps, pregnancy and stretch mark care

Why Palmers? For over 180 years, Palmer's has crafted treatment-oriented beauty products using Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Olive Oil & Vitamin E to soothe, hydrate, soften, replenish and revitalize skin and hair

B08SSB2QDQ.product_name: Mederma Stretch Marks Therapy - Prevents & Treats Stretch Marks, Safe for Pregnancy & Breastfeeding, Hydrates & Nourishes Skin, 5.29 oz (150g)
B08SSB2QDQ.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Maternity
B08SSB2QDQ.description: Mederma Stretch Marks Therapy is a clinically shown formula designed to improve the appearance of stretch marks caused by pregnancy, weight gain, exercise, and growth spurts. This intensive cream combines Cepalin botanical extract, hyaluronic acid, and Centella Asiatica extract to hydrate the skin, enhance softness, and improve texture. Safe for use during pregnancy and breastfeeding, Unique triple-action formula penetrates into the skin and locks in moisture to help collagen production and cell renewal. With regular use, you can see noticeable improvements in just 4 weeks and optimal results in 12 weeks.
features: Clinically Shown Formula: Improves the appearance of stretch marks caused by pregnancy, weight gain, exercise, and growth spurts
Unique Triple-Action Formula: Penetrates beneath the surface of the skin to lock in moisture, help collagen production and renew skin cells
Safe for Pregnancy: Suitable for use during pregnancy and while breastfeeding

Optimal Results: Noticeable improvements in as soon as 4 weeks, with optimal results in 12 weeks of daily application. Apply at least 2 times a day by gently massaging into the skin in a circular motion
Trusted Brand: Mederma is trusted by doctors, pharmacists, pediatricians, and plastic surgeons (Of U.S. physicians and pharmacists surveyed by an independent market research firm)
HSA and FSA eligible product

B0FKVN5R5J.product_name: Frida Mom Anesthetic Spray, Hospital Strength Benzocaine and Glycerin for Instant Relief and Healing, Dermatologist Tested, with Aloe and Witch Hazel, Postpartum Essentials, 3.5oz
B0FKVN5R5J.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Maternity
B0FKVN5R5J.description: Frida Mom Anesthetic Spray is expertly formulated with hospital-strength benzocaine and glycerin to deliver instant pain relief and a protective barrier for sensitive skin. Perfect for postpartum women seeking immediate comfort after childbirth, this spray is gentle enough for the area and ideal for targeted, soothing relief. Infused with calming aloe and witch hazel—without parabens, phthalates, or fragrances—this dermatologist-tested formula supports skin recovery and comfort. The unique upside-down spray design ensures easy, hygienic, and no-touch application, reaching exactly where it’s needed. Simply spray the affected area for fast-acting comfort and ongoing protection during your healing process.
features: POSTPARTUM COMFORT: Specially designed for new moms, Frida Mom Anesthetic Spray delivers targeted relief. A postpartum essential that is gentle on you while helping you speed up your postpartum recovery journey.
2-in-1 HOSPITAL STRENGTH FORMULA: Combines benzocaine and glycerin for instant, lasting relief while creating a protective barrier to support healing and comfort.
GENTLE, TARGETED APPLICATION: Innovative design allows the spray to be used upside-down, delivering a fine, no-touch mist directly to sensitive areas for soothing relief.
SOOTHING INGREDIENTS: Enriched with aloe and witch hazel, this formula calms and nourishes skin without parabens, phthalates, or added fragrances.
DERMATOLOGIST TESTED & HYGIENIC: Developed for hospital-level relief and rigorously tested for safety, offering a clean, hands-free application every time.

B0D951L465.product_name: Lansinoh Magnesium Bedtime Butter Body Lotion for Pregnant Moms, Calm Magnesium Lotion for Aching Muscles, Lotion for Women & Soothing Massage, Promote Relaxation, Help Ease Cramps, 7 oz.
B0D951L465.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Maternity
B0D951L465.description: Attn: pregnant mamas – say hello to your new bedtime BFF! Lansinoh’s new Calming Bedtime Butter is a rich, luxurious body butter for women, designed specifically for use during maternity and postpartum. Made with a soothing blend of magnesium cream and the calming scents of lavender and chamomile, our power-packed formula helps support a relaxing bedtime routine for better zzz's and body care! Combine this nourishing lotion with gentle massage to give your tired, achy muscles a little extra TLC. Our body butter is safe for sensitive skin and dermatologically tested, with moisturizing shea butter and cocoa butter that melts into your skin overnight, leaving skin soft and supple. Wave goodbye to restless nights and say hello to the sleep routine of your dreams! For over 40 years, new mothers have trusted Lansinoh to support and care for them while they enter the messy magic of motherhood. Born from one mother’s realization that birthing people often go without the support they need and deserve, Lansinoh proudly stands with mothers all over the world. Our journey started with award winning, doctor recommended HPA Lanolin Nipple Cream: today, we offer a comprehensive collection of solutions to help new parents navigate pregnancy, birth, breastfeeding, and pumping. Our product range includes organic nipple balm, disposable nursing pads, washable nursing pads, breastmilk storage bags, manual breast pumps and double electric breast pumps, postpartum essentials, baby bottles, and more. Lansinoh products are available in more than 70 countries and the company is committed to being climate neutral by 2030.
features: LUXURIOUS BODY BUTTER - Moisturizing shea butter and cocoa butter melt into your skin overnight, leaving skin soft and supple
SOOTHE & RELAX AT BEDTIME - Calming magnesium, shea butter, plus lavender and chamomile scents help you prepare for sleep
EXTRA TLC FOR TIRED LEGS - Pair this body lotion with gentle massage to soothe tired, aching muscles at the end of a long day
SPECIFICALLY DESIGNED FOR PREGNANCY - Dermatologically tested and for sensitive skin; Lotion for women formulated for use during pregnancy and postpartum
PERFECT GIFT FOR PREGNANT WOMEN - Pamper mamas-to-be with this rich, luxurious lotion; a pregnancy must have for a relaxing bedtime routine

B0FQ5T1SR7.product_name: Castor Oil Patches for Belly Button – 50PCS Disposable Castor Oil Pack Wraps with Organic Cotton Pad, Leak-Proof Belly Button Patch Cover, Breathable & Skin-Friendly
B0FQ5T1SR7.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Maternity
B0FQ5T1SR7.description:
Designed for Castor Oil Use – Specially made castor oil patches with a central cotton pad. Please note: the patch itself does not contain oil. Simply add a few drops of your own cold-pressed castor oil and apply to the belly button or preferred body area.
Quick & Mess-Free Application – No more complicated wraps or oil spills. Just peel, add 3–5 drops of castor oil, wait 1–2 minutes for absorption, and apply. Compared with traditional castor oil pack wraps, these disposable patches are more time-saving and cost-effective.
Optimal 2.75in × 2.75in Size – Comfortable Fit – Each castor oil belly button patch measures 7×7cm (2.75in × 2.75in), a practical size that comfortably covers the navel and adheres securely to body contours without feeling bulky.
Breathable & Gentle on Skin – Made with soft spunlace non-woven fabric (0.8 mm² porosity) that is lightweight, breathable, and comfortable. The strong adhesive backing keeps patches secure while remaining gentle for extended wear.
Leak-Resistant & Value Pack – Built with a 2mm thick cotton core and protective border that helps lock in oil and reduce leakage. Each package includes 50 disposable belly button patches (7×7cm / 2.75in × 2.75in), compact and portable for home, travel, or outdoor use.

B0DR37R7JN.description: Experience younger-feeling and healthier-looking skin with Gold Bond Age Renew Crepe Corrector Body & Face Lotion for crepey skin. Not only does Gold Bond Crepe Corrector cream immediately improve the texture and smoothness of the skin, it also provides hydration for 24 hours to help visibly firm and plump dry, aging skin. Best of all, it's hypoallergenic, fragrance free and dermatologist tested.*back of hands and armsGOLD BOND AGE RENEW RETINOL OVERNIGHT BODY & FACE LOTIONSmoother-looking skin is a sleep away with Gold Bond Age Renew Retinol Overnight Body & Face Lotion. With stabilized retinol, the most clinically tested anti-aging ingredient,** this firming and tightening cream for mature skin helps visibly improve bounce and elasticity of skin. It provides long-lasting hydration with nourishing shea & cocoa butter. The nondrying, nonirritating retinol formula locks in moisture while you sleep. Best of all, this dermatologist-developed-and-tested moisturizer is hypoallergenic and free from parabens, dyes, and fragrances. It's suitable for use all over the body and face every day when used as directed. This skincare kit set is great for aging adults and beauty enthusiasts who are interested in healthy skin, self-care, and additions to their skincare routine.**based on number of clinical tests for anti-aging efficacy

B0D663VWFC.description:
Snail 96% Peptide Booster Serum: The famous Snail 96 Essence, but with a boost! Boost all benefits of the Snail 96 Essence with the Peptide Booster Toner.
The Real Snail Essence: Formulated with 96.3% Snail Secretion Filtrate, this essence repairs and rejuvenates the skin from dryness and aging. It improves skin vitality by reducing dullness and soothing dehydrated skin.
Skin Booster Peptide Toner Serum: Skin Boosting Toner Serum with 6 Peptides that improve skin elasticity, fine lines, pores, and radiance. Boost your skin's condition and achieve multiple benefits with this toner.
How to Use: 1. After cleansing, apply 2-3 pumps of the Peptide Booster Serum and gently pat to aid absorption. 2. Apply 2-3 pumps of the Snail 96 Essence. 3. Finish up with your favorite mosturizer if needed.
Patch Test Recommended: Perform a Patch Test on the body before using on the face. Proceed to using on the face if no irritation occurs in 24 hours. Consult with your doctor immediately if irritation occurs.

B0CG9ZY4QC.product_name: O'Keeffe's Giftbox Including Lip Repair with Cherry and Vitamin E Oil Stick, Working Hands Jar and Healthy Feet Jar, Gift Idea

B0CG9ZY4QC.description:
For over 25 years, O'Keeffe's hardworking skincare products have been providing guaranteed relief. This gift set contains three essential products:
O’Keeffe’s Working Hands Hand Cream is a concentrated, unscented hand cream that heals, relieves and repairs extremely dry, cracked hands. When used daily, O’Keeffe’s Working Hands Hand Cream is clinically proven to instantly boost moisture levels, help prevent further moisture loss, create a protective barrier on the skin’s surface, and make a difference you will feel within days.
Directions: Start with a small amount; it's all you need. Over-application can lead to stickiness. Apply to hands as needed. Mild stinging of severely dry skin is normal, but discontinue use if it persists.
O'Keeffe's for Healthy Feet Foot Cream is a concentrated moisturizer that heals, relieves, and repairs extremely dry, cracked feet. The #1 Foot Cream Brand in America* offers dry cracked feet treatment and dry cracked heel treatment. This concentrated foot cream creates a protective layer that instantly boosts moisture levels and helps prevent moisture loss which helps lead to soft feet. When used daily it is clinically proven to improve moisture levels.
Directions: Start by applying only a small amount of O'Keeffe's foot cream to dry feet to start and add more as needed. It is unscented and non-greasy and safe for diabetics' skin.
features: Giftbox includes: (1) Working Hands Hand Cream 3.4 ounce Jar, (1) Healthy Feet Foot Cream 3.2 ounce Jar, (1) Lip Repair Lip Balm with Cherry and Vitamin E Oil

Dry Hand Repair Cream: O’Keeffe’s Working Hands Hand Cream is a concentrated hand cream that heals, relieves, soothes and repairs extremely dry, cracked hands. Creates a protective layer on the skin's surface that locks in moisture and keeps your skin hydrated.

Heals Cracked and Dry Feet: O’Keeffe’s for Healthy Feet Foot Cream is a concentrated foot cream that heals, relieves and repairs. Creates a protective layer on the skin’s surface that instantly boosts moisture levels and helps prevent further moisture loss for foot care and health.

Relieves and Repairs Dry Cracked Lips: O'Keeffe's Lip Repair with Cherry & Vitamin E oil heals, relieves and repairs extremely dry cracked lips. Creates a flexible barrier that moves with your lips to help keep dry, cracked lips protected.
Works Fast: Most people start seeing improvements in their dry cracked skin in only a few days. O'Keeffe's skin care offers guaranteed relief.

B0BKQ451Z6.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Sets & Kits
B0BKQ451Z6.description:
Skin That Glows Like Glass - Looking for skin so healthy that pores look smooth and skin looks luminous? Our Glass Skin Discovery Kit features our iconic 4-step Glass Skin routine in convenient travel size toiletries.
Korean Skincare Gift Set - Power Calm Hydrating Gel Cleanser (1.0 oz), Wild Dew Treatment Essence (1.0 oz), Glass Skin Refining Serum (0.5 oz), and Matcha Pudding Antioxidant Cream (0.67 oz). Everything you need to achieve Glass Skin.

B00F97FHAW.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Creams & Moisturizers > Face Moisturizers
B00F97FHAW.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion with Sunscreen moisturizes throughout the day and helps to restore the protective skin barrier. This sunscreen lotion is Formulated with broad spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen for daily UV protection, protecting your skin from damaging UVA and UVB rays. This non-comedogenic moisturizer with SPF 30 spreads easily without leaving a chalky residue. •Suitable for all skin types •Oil-free •Non-comedogenic •Fragrance-free •Gentle, non-irritating formula •Recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation Key Ingredients: •InVisibleZinc Technology: Provides Broad Spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen •MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration •Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier •Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture •Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin
features: [ BROAD SPECTRUM SPF 30 ] A micro-fine zinc oxide sunscreen for UVA/UVB protection. This CeraVe moisturizer with SPF is a hydrating facial lotion that spreads easily, is absorbed quickly, and leaves a non-greasy finish

[ OIL FREE DAY CREAM ] Use this daily face sunscreen as the last step in a morning skincare routine. If layering with an eye cream, moisturizer or facial serum, apply Cerave AM facial lotion after other product applications have been fully absorbed
[ SUNSCREEN WITH NIACINAMIDE ] Contains Hyaluronic Acid to retain skin's moisture and Niacinamide to help calm skin. MVE Technology delivers hydration throughout the day

[ ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier

[ GENTLE ON SKIN ] Recommended for daily use by the Skin Cancer Foundation. Fragrance free, oil free, non-comedogenic, paraben-free. Suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, and acne-prone skin

B005IHT94S.product_name: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Sunscreen Lotion SPF 70, Broad Spectrum, Water Resistant 80 Min, Oil-Free, Oxybenzone-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Matte Finish, Body Sunscreen, Travel Size 3 Fl Oz
B005IHT94S.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Sunscreens & Tanning Products > Sunscreens > Body Sunscreens
B005IHT94S.description: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Sunscreen Lotion SPF 70 is a high-performance body sunscreen lotion designed for powerful, broad spectrum sun protection on the go. Formulated with advanced Helioplex technology, this lightweight, oil-free sunscreen helps shield your skin from both aging UVA and burning UVB rays. Key Benefits: - Broad spectrum SPF 70 sunscreen lotion for daily and outdoor use - Lightweight, dry-touch formula absorbs quickly for a comfortable, non-greasy feel - Water resistant sunscreen (up to 80 minutes) for sports, travel, and outdoor activities - Oxybenzone-free and Hawaii Act 104 compliant - Oil-free, non-comedogenic, and PABA-free—won't clog pores or leave a heavy residue - TSA-approved travel size sunscreen (3 fl oz) that fits easily in bags and carry-ons - Enriched with antioxidant Vitamin E to help defend against environmental stressors - from a dermatologist recommended brand, this body sunscreen is for reliable everyday protection. Use For: - Daily sun protection for body - Outdoor activities: hiking, gardening, biking, boating, beach days, and more - Travel and on-the-go sun care, including commutes and weekend trips Technical Details: - Broad spectrum SPF 70 (UVA/UVB protection) - Helioplex technology for stabilized sun protection - Water resistant (up to 80 minutes) - Oilfree, non-comedogenic, PABA-free, oxybenzone-free - Dermatologist recommended brand - TSAapproved 3 fl oz travel size Important Note: Some users, especially those with medium to dark skin tones, may notice a white cast or slight sheen. For best results, apply evenly and reapply after swimming or sweating. A mild scent may be present but typically fades quickly. If product separates, shake well before use. Disclaimer: Not a mineral sunscreen. For external use only. If irritation occurs, discontinue use.
features: SPF 70 broad spectrum sunscreen lotion delivers high UVA/UVB protection for daily use; water resistant for up to 80 minutes to help guard skin during outdoor activities. Apply 15 minutes before sun exposure and reapply as directed.

Lightweight, oil-free, non-comedogenic Dry-Touch formula absorbs quickly for most users, leaving an ultra-light feel. Finish may vary; some may notice a slight sheen or visible white cast, especially on medium to dark skin tones.

Oxybenzone-free, Hawaii Act 104 compliant, PABA-free body sunscreen; powered by Helioplex technology to provide stable protection against aging UVA and burning UVB rays while helping defend skin from environmental stressors.

Convenient 3 fl oz travel size is TSA compliant and easy to pack in carry-ons, gym bags, or backpacks; a portable sunscreen lotion for on-the-go protection at the beach, park, or commute without weighing down your routine.

Trusted by dermatologists, this formula includes antioxidant Vitamin E for added defense. For best results, reapply at least every 2 hours and after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating; a minority may experience irritation—patch test if unsure.

B084ZP848Y.product_name: Blue Lizard Sensitive Mineral SPF 50 Sunscreen Lotion, 100% Mineral Sunscreen, UVA/UVB Protection, Infused with organic Aloe Vera, Soothes and Hydrates, 5 fl oz | with Zinc Oxide, 50+, Water Resistant, UVAUVB Protection, Sensitve
B084ZP848Y.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Sunscreens & Tanning Products > Sunscreens > Body Sunscreens
B084ZP848Y.description: Help keep your sensitive skin safe from the sun with Blue Lizard Sensitive Mineral SPF 50 Sunscreen Lotion. This mineral sunscreen with Zinc Oxide and Titanium Dioxide is free from harsh chemical active ingredients that might irritate sensitive skin while protecting it from 98% of UVB rays. Ideal for beach days, sporting events, or everyday sun protection, the water-resistant formula will help keep your skin protected for up to 80 minutes. Developed specifically for sensitive skin, the hypoallergenic formula is infused with soothing Aloe Vera and free from parabens, phthalates and fragrances. How to Use: Shake well prior to use. Apply liberally to dry skin 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply: after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying, or at least every 2 hours. For topical use only. Keep out of reach of children. For children under 6 months of age: Ask a doctor. Sun protection measures: Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a broad spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: Limit time in the sun, especially from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. Wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats and sunglasses. Protect the product in the container from excessive heat and direct sun. Product may stain some fabrics. We ♥ the Reef: This product is made without Oxybenzone or Octinoxate to help protect fragile reef ecosystems. Featuring our Smart Cap® Technology, the cap changes color in harmful UV light so you know when to apply sunscreen. Dermatologists have trusted Blue Lizard Australian Sunscreen for over 20 years

B077TQR6ZW.description:
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Ultra-Light Moisturizing Lotion with SPF 30 moisturizes with a matte finish & helps repair the protective skin barrier. It contains 3 essential ceramides to repair and restore the protective skin barrier. With a lightweight feel, this facial moisturizer absorbs quickly into the skin. Can be worn alone or under makeup.
Key Ingredients:
features: [ MOISTURIZER WITH SUNSCREEN ] A non-greasy sunscreen without white-cast and ultra-light moisturizer for face that hydrates and leaves the skin with a matte finish.

[ SUNSCREEN LOTION ] Use this SPF 30 moisturizer as the last step in a morning skin care routine. If layering with an eye cream, moisturizer or facial serum, apply Cerave Ultra-Light Facial Moisturizing Lotion after other products have been fully absorbed.

[ DAILY FACE SUNSCREEN ] Broad Spectrum SPF 30 helps protect skin from UVA/UVB rays. In addition to other sun protection measures, Dermatologists recommend using daily sunscreen with at least SPF 30 to help decrease risk of skin cancer caused by the sun

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] Oil free, Fragrance free, paraben-free, allergy-tested and non-comedogenic sunscreen recommended for daily use by the Skin Cancer Foundation.

B0CXLYHYHN.description:
LIGHTWEIGHT TEXTURE POWDER: Unlike heavy gels or pastes, our Texture Powder is lightweight, volumizing and easy to apply. We formulated our powder to instantly add volume with a clean matte finish by absorbing any excess oil.
SHORT TO MEDIUM HAIR TYPE: To provide proper hold and volume, our texture powder is best for hair under 6 inches in length.
HOW TO USE: With your hand at least 2 inches from your head, apply 3-4 pumps of powder to dry hair. Use your fingers to evenly distribute the powder throughout your hair. If you need more hold, add some more product.
CONVENIENT SPRAY BOTTLE DESIGN: The spray bottle design allows you to get a consistent amount of powder every time. Simply take off the cap, pump, and style. No more making messes with shaker bottles.
QUALITY INGREDIENTS: Our Hair Texturizing Powder is 100% vegan and cruelty free. Made in The United States with no Sulfates, Parabens, or Phthalates. We only use 5 ingredients: Silica Silylate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Silica, Mica, & Maranta Arundinacea Root Extract so you know exactly what you’re putting in your hair.

B085S8DGWT.description: Viviscal Hair Growth Supplements for Women are clinically proven to promote thicker hair, fuller hair, and healthier growth. Formulated with Marine Collagen, Biotin, Zinc, Vitamin C, and Iron, this drug-free hair growth supplement nourishes thinning hair from within, helping strengthen strands and encourage natural hair regrowth. These hair vitamins are ideal for women experiencing hair thinning or hair loss due to stress, postpartum changes, hormonal shifts, or aging. Viviscal is suitable for all hair types — including color-treated, fine, or thinning hair — and works alongside your daily hair care routine. Clinical studies show significant improvements in hair volume and reduced shedding, making it a trusted choice for women’s hair growth. This 1-month supply (60 tablets) is perfect for getting started on your journey to visibly thicker, fuller hair. Take two tablets daily for best results and pair with Viviscal shampoos and conditioners for a complete hair care routine.

B0DV42H38H.product_name: CeraVe Gentle Hydrating Shampoo, With Ceramides, Niacinamide & Hyaluronic Acid For Soft, Healthy Looking Hair & Scalp, Sulfate Free & Color Safe Shampoo, For All Hair Types, 12 Oz
B0DV42H38H.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Hair Care > Shampoo & Conditioner > Shampoos
B0DV42H38H.description: Introducing the CeraVe Gentle Hydrating Shampoo, hair care solution developed with dermatologists to ensure the gentle care for your scalp and hair. This shampoo is formulated to cleanse your hair without disrupting your scalp barrier, making it an ideal choice for those with sensitive scalp. Shampoo for women and men. The CeraVe Gentle Hydrating Shampoo is an allergy-tested formula. Shampoo is free from sulfates, MIT, dyes, parabens, and fragrances, ensuring a gentle yet effective cleansing experience. It is suitable for all hair types, including various curl patterns and color-treated hair. This gentle shampoo removes buildup from the scalp and hair while maintaining moisture, leaving your hair looking healthy and feeling soft. Shampoo with three skin-identical ceramides, niacinamide, and hyaluronic acid , helps support the scalp's natural barrier and maintain moisture balance. Can be used as a shampoo for color treated hair. This moisturizing shampoo is pH balanced and is designed to be gentle on both the scalp and hair, making it suitable for daily use For best results, use the CeraVe Gentle Hydrating Shampoo with the CeraVe Gentle Hydrating Conditioner. This combination will leave your hair feeling soft, nourished, and moisturized. Hair care for women and men. To use, apply the shampoo to wet hair and scalp, massage into a rich lather, and rinse thoroughly. Follow with the conditioner for best results. Avoid direct contact with eyes, and if contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. Experience the difference with CeraVe Gentle Hydrating Shampoo, where science meets care, providing you with a gentle yet effective solution for maintaining healthy looking, beautiful hair. *In a consumer test, after one use of gentle hydrating shampoo + conditioner **system vs. non-conditioning shampoo

B0012BNVE8.product_name: Men’s Rogaine 5% Minoxidil for Men Foam, Clinically Proven Regrowth for Thinning Hair, Topical Hair Loss Treatment, Unscented Topical Aerosol, Results in 8–16 Weeks, 3-Month Supply, 3 x 2.11 oz
B0012BNVE8.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Hair Care > Hair Loss Products > Hair Regrowth Treatments
B0012BNVE8.description: Men’s Rogaine minoxidil for men foam is a clinically proven topical aerosol hair regrowth treatment featuring a 5% minoxidil formula to reactivate hair follicles and help regrow fuller, thicker hair. Designed for the early stages of thinning at the vertex (top of the scalp), this unscented minoxidil for men foam leverages Tricho-Prime Technology—a blend of botanical extracts, nourishing emollients, and alpha hydroxy acid (AHA)—to condition and gently exfoliate the scalp, help keep follicles open, and create an optimal environment for hair growth. Clinical studies show noticeable new hair regrowth in 12 weeks with consistent twice-daily use; individual timelines vary, and you may notice early signs between weeks 8–12 with fuller benefits around week 16. Because response can vary, you may experience initial shedding as weaker hairs make way for new growth; maintain consistent application to see the best results over time. To use, dispense approximately half a capful and apply directly to clean, dry thinning areas on the top of the scalp morning and night, gently massaging the product into the skin; allow it to dry completely before styling. The no-mess, quick-absorbing foam integrates seamlessly into daily routines and fits easily into your regular hair care regimen. Each pack provides a 3-month supply with three 2.11 oz bottles to support uninterrupted treatment and routine adherence. As a trusted hair loss treatment for men, this targeted foam penetrates the scalp to stimulate follicle activity and support hair protein production for visible regrowth with continued use. For best results, commit to consistent twice-daily application for at least 4 months to allow new growth to appear and mature; ongoing use is needed to maintain results. Rogaine is the #1 dermatologist-recommended hair growth product brand. If you’re ready to address hereditary hair loss at the vertex, choose the convenience of minoxidil for men foam and start your hair growth journey today.
features: Clinical hair regrowth: Clinically proven to improve hair regrowth by 4x versus control at 16 weeks; unscented topical aerosol foam, 3-month supply, apply half-capful twice daily on scalp to regrow fuller, thicker hair and reverse hereditary hair loss.

Scalp conditioning technology: Tricho-Prime technology with botanical extracts and emollients conditions scalp and keeps follicles open; alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) exfoliates gently to enhance minoxidil absorption and support hair growth products.

Targeted thinning hair treatment: Minoxidil for men foam stimulates hair follicle activity and boosts hair protein production; formulated for men with general thinning at the top of the scalp to promote fuller, denser hair regrowth.

Easy daily application: Unscented, no-mess foam fits seamlessly into your hair care and hair growth routine; this 5% minoxidil topical hair loss treatment applies in a half-capful twice daily on clean, dry scalp for a full 3-month supply.

Brand trust and efficacy: From the #1 dermatologist-recommended Rogaine, this 5% minoxidil foam for men is clinically proven to reverse hereditary hair loss and deliver visible regrowth; scientifically validated in clinical studies.

B0725BK81G.product_name: Gillette Mach3 Razor Blades for Men, 3-Blade Razor Refills, 15 Count

B0725BK81G.description: Gillette Mach3 men’s razor refills are designed for a classic close shave with comfort and precision. These three bladed razor refills for men are equipped with an improved lubrication strip that adds a smooth glide to your shave. Along with durability, these three bladed razor refills feature an upgraded lubrication strip (vs previous Mach3) for enhanced glide to help protect your skin from redness during shaving. The Lubrastrip also fades when you are no longer getting an optimal shave. Designed for your comfort, the razor blade refills are equipped with soft micro fins that gently stretch and smooth skin, preparing hairs to be cut for the optimal shaving experience. Gillette Mach3 razor blade refills feature three DuraComfort blades and an Open Blade Architecture for easy rinsing to keep your razor blades clean and performing their best. Each razor blade refill is engineered to last up to fifteen comfortable shaves, so you can get the most of every shave. Pairs perfectly with Gillette’s Series Shaving Gel for added protection from shaving irritation. Concerned your Gillette handle won't fit? All of our Mach3 razor blades fit all Mach3 razor handles.

1 BLADE = 15 SHAVES. Get up to 15 shaves from each Mach3 razor refill

Trust the #1 Electric shaver brand¹ and choose Philips Norelco Shaver 22400 Series: wet and dry electric shaver that gives you a fast, clean shave, even on sensitive skin.
 
 Its 27 self-sharpening ComfortCut Blades have a 2-year lifetime which makes your shaver perform like new every day. They cut each hair right above skin level for a smooth finish, while the 4D Pivot & Flex Heads follow your facial contour, protecting it from nicks and cuts. The blades are made from hypoallergenic steel to resist corrosion, prevent impurities, and protect your skin. 
 
 Shave wet or dry and take care of defining your mustache or sideburns with the pop-up trimmer. Clean the device at the touch of a button with one-touch open to easily rinse under the tap. 
 
 A durable NiMH battery provides 40 minutes of shaving time on a single 1-hour charge. A 5-minute quick charge gives you enough power for one shave when in a hurry. Charge with a USB-A charging cable (power adapter not included). 
 
 ¹ Source: Euromonitor International Limited, retail value RSP, per body shavers category definition, 2022 data, research conducted in December 202
features: From the #1 electric shaver brand¹: Shaver 2400 Series gives you a fast, clean shave even on sensitive skin thanks to 27 self-sharpening ComfortCut blades and 4D Flex Heads
Designed for life, built to last: with 2-year self-sharpening steel blades lifetime you can enjoy a shaver that performs like new every day
Fast, clean shave: 27 self-sharpening ComfortCut blades comfortably cut hair right above skin level for a smooth, even finish, every time
Choose a convenient dry shave, or pair with your favorite foam or gel for a refreshing wet shave, even in the shower
Floating heads move freely in 4 directions to keep contact with the curves of your face, protecting it from nicks and cuts
The set includes: 1x Shaver 2400 Series, 1x pop-up trimmer, 1x p-cap, 1x USB-A charging cable; power adapter not included

B07N6W7RPC.product_name: Gillette Venus ComfortGlide White Tea Women's Razor, Handle + 4 Blade Refills
B07N6W7RPC.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Women's > Razors & Blades > Cartridge Razors
B07N6W7RPC.description: Venus razors for women are designed with a woman’s body in mind. From handles designed for a comfortable grip to pivoting heads that contour to curves, Venus razors are designed to help reveal touchably smooth skin. Venus ComfortGlide White Tea razor blades feature 3 curve-hugging blades and built-in flexible Soap Bars that when wet, release light White Tea scented body butters helping the razor glide seamlessly over your skin. No need for separate shaving cream! Did you know that any Venus blade refill fits any Venus razor handle? Shave your way without buying a whole new Venus handle.
features: 3 BLADED: Each refill has 3 curve-hugging blades for a smooth, close shave that last, and are designed to resist rust
SEAMLESS GLIDE: The gel bars are water-activated, bringing a smooth glide to every stroke
SKIN PROTECTION: The razor's moisture bars release a rich body butter lather, guarding your skin against nicks, cuts and irritation. Brings seamless glide to every stroke
ADAPTIVE PIVOTING DESIGN: These women’s razors have a pivoting design that adjusts to your body for the ultimate precision
WHITE TEA SCENTED moisture bars leave your skin smooth as you shave
ERGONOMIC HANDLE designed to last, so you can be in control. Any Venus blade refill fits any Venus razor handle (except Simply Venus and Venus Pubic Hair Razor)

B004B8F8MM.product_name: Gillette Fusion5 Power Razor Blades for Men, 5-Blade Razor Refills, 8 Count
B004B8F8MM.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Men's > Razors & Blades > Razor Blades & Cartridges > Cartridges
B004B8F8MM.description: Get the precision of a Gillette shave with comfort and style. The Gillette Fusion5 Power razor blades feature 5 antifriction blades that are positioned closely together for incredible comfort and a shave you barely feel. These razor blades also feature an indicator lubrastrip which fades when you are no longer getting an optimal shave. Soft microfins help to smooth and stretch skin before the blades preparing hairs to be cut. Use the precision trimmer on the back for hard-to-reach places and styling facial hair. Not sure if these blades will fit your existing razor handle? All Gillette 5-blade razor handles will fit these Fusion5 Power razor blades (excluding GilletteLabs).
features: REFILLS FIT ALL all Fusion5 and ProGlide RAZOR HANDLES (excluding GilletteLabs)
Gillette Fusion5 Power razor blades feature advanced 5 BLADE TECHNOLOGY
SOFT MICROFINS help to smooth and stretch skin before the razor blades preparing hairs to be cut
PRECISION BEARD TRIMMER for tricky spots like sideburns, under the nose, and around facial hair
INDICATOR LUBRASTRIP that fades to white when you are no longer getting the optimal Gillette Fusion shave
FLEXIBLE COMFORT GUARD follows the contours of your face for a comfortably close shave

B003JFJF4A.product_name: Nad's Facial Wax Strips - Hypoallergenic All Skin Types - Facial Hair Removal For Women - At Home Waxing Kit with 20 Face Wax Strips + 4 Calming Oil Wipes + Skin Protection Powder
B003JFJF4A.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Women's > Waxing > Strips
B003JFJF4A.description: Nad's Facial Wax Strips is a quick and easy way to remove unwanted facial hair from the upper lip, cheek, chin and middle brow. Made from natural beeswax, the facial wax strips use an innovative contour weave paper technology, which is softer and more flexible to conform to your facial curves. Nad's Facial Wax Strips remove hair as short as 2mm and leaves your skin hair free for weeks. Suitable for sensitive skin as the facial strips are hypoallergenic and fragrance free. With regular use, hair growth is progressively slowed down.
features: FACIAL WAX STRIPS: No heat, no mess, no fuss! Remove unwanted facial hair for up to 6 weeks of smooth, hair-free skin.
SAFETY: Please read precautions and instructions before use; NOTE: It's important NOT to wax the same facial area twice as repeated waxing of this delicate area can cause irritation.
EASY TO USE: The wax itself is formulated with beeswax for strong adherence to unwanted hair, removing hair as short as 2mm to leave the skin looking and feeling silky smooth for up to 6 weeks.
IDEAL FOR: Face, chin, upper lip, mono-brow hairs, fingers, and toes. Suitable for all skin types. Nad's are PETA certified for cruelty free hair removal.
INCLUDES: 20 (10 double sided) Waxing Strips, 4 Calming Oil Wipes and skin shield powder.

B0001LQGPG.description: Disposable razor that can get you up to 10 gentle shaves? Gillette’s Sensor3 Sensitive does that thanks to 3 chromium-coated, skin sensing blades and a pivot head that adjusts to the contours of your face. Its enhanced Lubrastrip with water-activated Comfortgel technology provides you with an ultra gentle shaving. The razor features an anti-slip rubber handle for control and maneuverability and easy rinse blades for 100% better rinsing*. *vs. Sensor2 Plus
features: Up to 10 gentle shaves per razor
3 skin sensing blades for a comfortable shave
Enhanced Lubrastrip with water-activated Comfortgel technology for ultra gentle shaving
40 degree pivoting head which adjusts to the contours of the face

B0CDNQ62ML.product_name: MANSCAPED® The Lawn Mower® 5.0 Ultra Groin & Body Hair Trimmer – Dual-Head SkinSafe® Trimmer & Foil Blades, Waterproof Wet/Dry Groomer, USB-C Rechargeable with Travel Case, Men’s Ball Shaver, Black
B0CDNQ62ML.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Men's > Body Groomers
B0CDNQ62ML.description:
THE LAWN MOWER 5.0 ULTRA: Includes two Interchangeable SkinSafe Blade Heads: A Trimmer Blade & Foil Blade. One fixed-length comb at 1.4mm and two adjustable combs ranging from 2-12mm, power adapter, USB-C cable, and a travel pouch. Our trimmer is USB-C and wireless charging compatible.
SMOOTH OPTIONAL: The interchangeable dual-head system is specifically designed to give you a skin-close shave. Use our SkinSafe Trimmer Blade to take a little off the top, then go in with the SkinSafe Foil Blade for a smooth finish. *SkinSafe technology does not guarantee cut protection.
LIGHT YOUR SPOT: Grooming below the waist shouldn’t be a guessing game. Dual-temp LEDs better illuminate multiple skin tones so everyone can feel confident trimming down there. Spend more time trimming, less time charging with a 700mAh Li-ion battery that holds a charge for up to 60 minutes. A travel lock helps reduce accidental powering on of the device, so your trimmer is fully juiced when you arrive at your destination. Press and hold the lock button for 5 seconds to engage / disengage.
TAKE IT TO THE SHOWER: This waterproof* trimmer doesn’t mind getting a little wet. Whether you’re touching up or going into detail, both blades can be used wet or dry, saving time and cleanup. *IPX7 rated to protect against immersion in up to one meter of fresh water for up to 30 minutes.
GROIN, BODY & BACK: Haven’t you ever wondered what your pubes would look like shaved into a mohawk? A high fade? No? Fine, us neither. No matter what you’re sporting, The Lawn Mower 5.0 Ultra and its SkinSafe dual-head system makes manicuring your manliness easy. If you want to switch it up and trim other parts of your body like your chest, armpits, back, arms, or legs, The Lawn Mower 5.0 Ultra has you covered.

B0BQP1WVT9.description: Meet “The Internet’s Favorite Razor” – winner of countless awards and with over 20,000 5-star reviews, it’s designed to float over your skin for an ultra-close, ultra-smooth shave. It’s a premium, high-quality razor for a great price. The Billie Razor is made with 5 sharp blades encased in 360º of soothing aloe shave soap that helps your razor float over your skin like a comfy cloud. Say bye to stubble, irritation, bumps and ingrown hair! The ergonomic handle is made with a non-slip matte rubber back and comes in fun colors to brighten your bathroom. It also comes with a magnetic holder to keep your razor on the shower wall and out of the shower puddle. No more suction cups!
features: WOMEN’S RAZOR KIT: A non-slip ergonomic handle, four 5-blade razor refills, and signature magnetic holder.
5 NICKEL-FREE BLADES: Super sharp and surrounded by aloe shave soap
EASY & COMFORTABLE: Non-slip ergonomic handle with a pivoting head
MAGNETIC HOLDER: Keeps your razor on the shower wall and out of the shower puddle.
DERMATOLOGIST-APPROVED: Great for all skin types, even sensitive skin.
COMPLETE YOUR SET: Pairs perfectly with the Billie Whipped Shave Cream and Travel Case, for the ultimate shave experience.

B0DVZPXVMV.product_name: Peach Slices - Smoothing Solution Ingrown Hair Treatment (1.69 oz) - Smooth, Relieve, Soften Skin - 360 Roller - BHA, AHA, PHA, Niacinamide, Licorice - Vegan & Cruelty Free - Korean Skin Care & Beauty
B0DVZPXVMV.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Women's
B0DVZPXVMV.description:
Ingrown Hairs? - So out with our smoothing treatment. This easy-glide roller helps visibly clear and prevent ingrowns and bumps from waxing, shaving, and grooming with zero mess—silicone-free, fragrance-free, alcohol-free, and cruelty-free.
360 Roller Technology - Our precise roller applicator enables the solution to glide on effortlessly, even in hard-to-reach areas, for targeted post-breakout care with nourishing ingredients that deliver visibly smoother, healthier skin.
Vital Nutrients for Skin - Face-grade actives and soothing botanicals help target problem areas without harsh chemicals, scents, or drying. BHA gently exfoliates, cica hydrates and nourishes, and niacinamide targets dark spots for calmer skin.
How to Use - Roll onto clean, dry skin, targeting areas of the body prone to razor bumps, ingrown hairs, or dark spots, such as the underarms, bikini line, legs, neck, or shave areas. The suggested routine is Wash, Spray, Lotion, then Treatment.
Peach Slices offers easy, clinical solutions, powered by K-beauty innovations, for tough skin issues like acne, oily skin, and redness. Formulated without any harsh chemicals: fragrance free, kind to skin, alcohol free, and cruelty free.

B0BNP56GKH.product_name: Philips Norelco OneBlade Anti Friction Blade, Genuine Replacement Blade for OneBlade Electric Shaver and Trimmer, Durable Stainless Steel, Trim, Edge and Shave, 2 Pack, QP225/80
B0BNP56GKH.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Men's > Electric Shavers > Replacement Heads
B0BNP56GKH.description: Forget about using multiple steps and tools. OneBlade does it all. Its dual protection system – a glide coating combined with rounded tips – makes shaving easier and comfortable. Its shaving technology features a fast-moving cutter, which powers through any length of hair. Anti Friction Blade has a layer of micro glass beads for less irritation compared to the Original Blades. Each replacement blade can last up to 4 months¹ and is effortlessly easy to use. You can use it wet or dry, with or without foam, creams, or gel or in the shower, making this a great trimmer/razor choice for men. Time to get your perfect facial style and stubble. ¹ For the best shaving experience. Based on 2 full shaves per week. Actual results may vary. ² Fits with OneBlade products (QP14xx, QP25xx, QP26xx, QP27xx, QP28xx) and OneBlade Pro (QP65xx, QP66xx)
features: The authentic genuine Philips OneBlade blades
Fits with OneBlade products (QP14xx, QP25xx, QP26xx, QP27xx, QP28xx) and OneBlade Pro (QP65xx, QP66xx)
Anti Friction Blade: it’s smooth, like really smooth; a layer of micro glass beads dials down friction while you shave, and because that helps reduce razor burn, you don’t need foam or water
Durable stainless-steel blade that lasts up to 4 months¹ of use to keep that fresh feel
With replacement indicator: when the eject icon appears on the blade, the blade performance may no longer be optimal; it's time to consider changing the blade for the best shaving experience
The set includes: an 8-month¹ blade supply (2x Anti Friction Blade)

B0BTJWSGXV.product_name: MANSCAPED® The Weed Whacker® 2.0 Electric Nose & Ear Hair Trimmer – 7,000 RPM Precision Tool with Rechargeable Battery, Wet/Dry, Easy to Clean, Improved Stainless Steel Replaceable Blade

B0BTJWSGXV.description:
WEED WHACKER 2.0: Fitted with a significantly improved stainless steel rotary blade, our second-generation nose & ear hair trimmer provides a closer, easier cut, missing fewer hairs.
A CUT ABOVE THE REST: A premium 7,000 RPM motor powers our new 360° rotary dual-blade system so you experience a clean and close cut.
UNPLUG. UNHAIR: Sniffing out stray hairs on the go has never been easier. With a USB-C rechargeable battery, this nose and ear hair trimmer operates on its own power supply with up to 45 minutes of runtime.
MIND YOUR MANHOLES: Get more precision in your prep with a matte, rubberized grip that’s easy to hold and gets where it needs to go. Our trimmer works in wet and dry conditions, so you can use it in the shower or rinse it off under the faucet.
ATTRACT THE RIGHT ATTENTION: If you’re starting to notice a few unruly hairs creeping out of your nose and ears, don’t panic. Once you make trimming your manholes with the Weed Whacker 2.0 part of your essential grooming routine, no one will know.

B0DGHVZPQK.product_name: Billie Disposable Razors for Women - The Malibu Set
B0DGHVZPQK.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Women's > Razors & Blades > Disposable Razors
B0DGHVZPQK.description: Meet the Malibu Set, a trio of 3-blade razors from Billie lovingly designed to deliver a great shave with minimal irritation. Tested by dermatologists, they’re gentle on skin and cushioned in aloe shave soap for a smooth, easy glide. Made with women’s bodies in mind, the flexible head pivots around curves so you can shave even the hard-to-reach spots with no problem. To give you a sure and steady grip, the handle is backed with matte rubber so the razor won’t slip out of your hand when wet. The Malibu Set comes with 3 vividly colorblocked shades inspired by Billie’s original Razor Starter Kit in Malibu. This set of 3-blade razors is always ready to smooth anytime, anywhere, making it perfect for when you’re on-the-go or prepping for a trip. No need to remember to bring along extra razor blade refills (or commit to a single color); these razors are ready to shave at any moment. The handle variety also lets you switch up your shave and give your bathroom (or travel bag) a fresh new pop of color whenever you like.
features: READY TO SMOOTH: These 3-blade razors are ready to smooth anytime, anywhere, making them perfect for when you’re on-the-go or prepping for a trip. No need to bring along extra blade refills—these razors are ready to shave at any moment
DERMATOLOGIST-TESTED: Gentle on skin, these 3-blade razors were designed to float over skin for a smooth shave, thanks to aloe shave soap that creates an easy, satisfying glide.

DESIGNED TO MINIMIZE IRRITATION: Lovingly crafted to reflect the way women shave, these razors are designed to be gentle on skin and easy to use. The triple steel blades are cushioned in aloe shave soap for a smooth, seamless glide

EASY-GLIDE ALOE SHAVE SOAP: Tired of razors that don’t glide well. These blades are cushioned in aloe shave soap to create just the right amount of slip, giving you a smooth, uninterrupted glide and a nice, close shave

FLEXIBLE and ERGONOMIC: These razors feature a flexible head that pivots around curves so you can shave even the hard-to-reach spots. To give you a comfy grip, the handle is backed with matte rubber so the razor won’t slip out of your hand when wet.

B07CYN88NJ.description: Amazon Basics 5-Blade Razor for Women has a rounded razor cartridge design and a lubricating strip with botanical oils and Vitamin E surrounding the blades. To load refill cartridge, hold the larger half of the cartridge with blades facing down, remove plastic top, and push razor into the back of cartridge until it clicks. Care instructions: Suction the shower hanger to a clean and dry section of your tub or shower wall. After use, place razor in shower hanger to allow the lube strip to dry.

B01ALAVIK4.description: Satin Care Ultra Sensitive is a shaving gel for women designed for sensitive skin needing special care. This shaving cream for women is free of two potential sources of irritation: dyes and fragrances, while improving razor glide to protect your skin while shaving (vs. Ivory soap) and leaving you soft and ultra smooth every time you shave. The shave gel lathers to provide incredible razor glide to help protect the skin from nicks and cuts. This shaving gel is made without elements that can irritate skin, like dyes and fragrances. Dermatologist tested for sensitive skin. Now available in a Rust-Free Can, so you don’t have to worry about rust rings in your shower. B0DQ7HCRZ3.product_name: Gillette Foamy Classic Shave Foam for Men, Protection Against Shaving Irritation, Quick and Smooth Shave, shaving cream, 14.9 Oz

B0DQ7HCRZ3.description: The Gillette Foamy Classic Shave Foam is a classic for a reason: it’s the quick and easy shave you need, with the smoothness and protection against shaving irritation you want. Classic as it is comforting, millions of men know and trust Gillette Foamy Classic for a reason – it is the shaving cream that has been enjoyed for generations! While gels and foams are both good at giving you a comfortable shave, Gillette Foamy Regular Shaving Foam contains hydrating emollients and lubricating ingredients. That means you can lock in moisture, soften your facial hair, and expect a smooth razor glide for a more comfortable shave. Gillette Foamy Regular shaving cream provides a thick, extra rich, creamy lather for a close, comfortable shave. The Foamy shaving cream spreads easily across your face and rinses clean leaving skin feeling soft and smooth. The Comfort Glide formula reduces friction while shaving. In short: less time and energy spent on your shaving routine. For best results, use Gillette Foamy shaving foam with your favorite Gillette razor.
features: CLASSIC PROTECTION: Helps protect your skin against shaving irritation, cuts, nicks, and stinging with Gillette's classic formula
IT’S QUICK, EASY AND SMOOTH: Gillette Comfort Glide formula helps razors glide clean and fast for a shave with few tugs, pulls, friction and shaving irritation
FOAMY, AIRY TEXTURE: Gillette's foamy, airy texture makes it easy to lather and rinse off with a smooth glide, ideal for the fast shave you want
A GREAT DEAL: Gillette Foamy Mega Can can with 35% more foam
WORLD'S #1 SHAVE AND FOAM BRAND: There's a reason Gillette's been around for 100 years, Gillette knows what men want in a shave

B00QY1XZ4W.product_name: Vanicream Gentle Facial Cleanser with Pump Dispenser - 8 fl oz - Formulated Without Common Irritants for Those with Sensitive Skin
B00QY1XZ4W.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Cleansers > Washes
B00QY1XZ4W.description: Vanicream Gentle Facial Cleaner, Formulated without Common Irritants for Sensitive Skin Vanicream Gentle Facial Cleanser is our mildest formula designed specifically for daily use on sensitive skin. Helps removes dirt, oil, and makeup without drying or irritating the skin. Unlike traditional facial cleansers, Vanicream leaves your skin feeling clean, soft, and refreshed, never tight. Formulated without common irritants, the cleanser contains no soap, sulfates, gluten, dyes, lanolin, parabens, or formaldehyde releasers. Non-comedogenic, meaning it won’t clog pores. The pH-balanced formula ensures a gentle yet thorough cleanse. Dermatologist-tested and accepted by the National Eczema Association, this gentle formula contains ingredients that are essential components of the skin and benefit all skin types. Apply to wet skin; lather, rinse, and pat dry. For best results, apply any Vanicream Moisturizer (sold separately) after cleansing. Trust Vanicream, the #1 Dermatologist Recommended Brand for Sensitive Skin*, for your family's skincare needs. With over 50 years of expertise, our primary purpose is to make products for people with sensitive skin. Please note: There are no fragrances or masking fragrances in Vanicream products, but there may be a slightly different aroma to each batch; packaging may vary *Source IQVIA ProVoice Survey, 12 months ending July 2024. Packaging may vary.
features: Our mildest cleanser specifically formulated for daily facial use.
Helps remove makeup and excess skin oils without drying your skin.
Leaves skin feeling clean and soft.
Ideal for dry skin.

B0D7RL5MD3.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
B0D7RL5MD3.description:
Versatile Palette for Eye-Catching Looks - This 9-shade makeup palette combines luxe matte eyeshadow, shimmer eyeshadow, and an exclusive foil-finish for customizable styles from subtle to striking eye makeup.
Debut Foil Formula for High-Impact Shine - Features the brand-new Molten Metal Eyeshadow, an ultra-reflective formula that applies dry for creamy radiance or wet for a molten, liquid-metal effect that transforms your eyeshadow palette game.
Luxe Texture Variety - Crafted with vegan makeup lovers in mind, this curated palette blends rich pigments and high-quality textures for pro-level payoff, perfect for beauty enthusiasts and MUA kits alike.
How to Use - Using the side of a packing brush, sweep Molten Metal Eyeshadow across lids for smooth, blendable, incredibly luminous payoff. Spray your brush tip with Continuous Setting Mist, before picking up Molten Metal Eyeshadow. Glide along lashlines or creases for molten-like shine.
Celebrate Your Inner Artist - Over the years, Morphe continues to break boundaries, fueled by iconic collaborations, internet-breaking launches, and an ever-increasing community. Today, Morphe exists to celebrate the inner artist in everyone by empowering beauty beginners and professionals alike with the tools and products to express themselves, unapologetically.

B01FY49Y44.product_name: Wrinkles Schminkles Chest Wrinkle Patch - Reusable Silicone Smoothing Pads for Cleavage & Body, Reduce Wrinkles & Stretch Marks, Sensitive Formulated, Secret to Radiant Skin (1 Pack)
B01FY49Y44.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Maternity
B01FY49Y44.description:
SMOOTH LOOKING SKIN: Ideal for overnight use when your skin clicks into repair mode or for 1-2 hours day for a quick boost, our skin-safe, reusable Chest Wrinkle Patches create an occlusive layer, pulling the skin taut to prevent creasing. Simultaneously boosting hydration, collagen production, and overall skin resilience.
NON-INVASIVE ALTERNATIVE: Custom-designed - our Signature Silicone Patches specifically target skin areas prone to crinkling, delivering noticeable results in just a few hours. Regular use is recommended for real refinement, enhancing your skin's appearance and combating unwanted lines and wrinkles.
TARGETED LINE REFINEMENT: A rejuvenating treatment specifically designed for chest wrinkles, our Medical Grade Silicone Patch comfortably sits on your chest while you sleep, working to rehydrate and refine the skin. Wake up to smoother skin and diminished lines – upgrade your beauty sleep.
REUSABLE AND SKIN-FRIENDLY: Made in the USA from high-quality 100% silicone, these patches are reusable and designed for comfort. Enjoy a skin-friendly solution that fits seamlessly into your daily routine. Our silicone patches are a simple addition to your skincare regimen, helping to support the appearance of smoother skin with regular use.
SKINCARE SIMPLICITY: Our Silicone Patches are a solo act — there is no need to supplement them with additional skincare. They work by keeping the skin taut creating a microclimate of hydration, our patches are to be used on their own with no other skincare underneath. Keep it simple and let the patch do the work.

B0G42W1RRW.product_name: Nemah Stretch Mark Cream for Pregnancy, Moisturizing Belly Cream with Algaktiv UpLift, Shea Butter & Macadamia Oil, Pregnancy Body Cream for Belly, Hips & Thighs, 3.4 oz

Deep Hydration And Elasticity Support: Powered by Algaktiv UpLift, Shea Butter, and Macadamia Oil, this rich emollient formula deeply hydrates skin as it stretches during pregnancy. Helps maintain suppleness, flexibility, and comfort across belly, hips, and thighs, supporting a smoother, more resilient feel throughout every trimester and postpartum care routine
Targeted Stretch Mark Prevention: Clinically guided Algaktiv UpLift combines with humectant-rich Glycerin and plant-based oils to help reinforce skin’s barrier strength and elasticity. Supports visible improvement in stretch-prone areas during and after pregnancy, leaving skin nourished, conditioned, and more evenly textured over time
Lightweight, Fast-Absorbing Texture: Non-greasy and easy to apply, this ultra-hydrating belly cream absorbs quickly into the skin, leaving no residue behind. Designed for twice-daily use, it provides continuous hydration and comfort, making it effortless to include in morning and evening body care routines for lasting skin support
Dermatologist Tested Clean Formula: Vegan and dermatologist tested, this pregnancy stretch mark cream is developed under strict EU clean standards and crafted without parabens or irritants. Designed for sensitive skin, it offers peace of mind and consistent nourishment for expecting and postpartum women seeking gentle, science-backed care
Elevated Daily Self-Care Experience: Enriched with Rice Bran, Sunflower, and Rosemary Extracts, this antioxidant blend helps condition and smooth the skin while offering a calming ritual of self-care. Encourages consistent hydration and confidence as your body changes, delivering a soothing, restorative experience with every application

B00JJZN1HG.product_name: Thinkbaby SPF 50+ Baby Sunscreen, 6 Oz. – Safe, Natural Mineral Sun Cream for Babies - Water Resistant – Broad Spectrum UVA/UVB Sun Protection – Vegan Sunscreen for Kids
B00JJZN1HG.breadcrumb: Baby Products > Baby Care > Grooming > Skin Care > Sun Protection
B00JJZN1HG.description:
SAFE, NATURAL PROTECTION: Thinkbaby sunscreen provides effective SPF 50+ sun protection for babies. The broad spectrum UVA & UVB kid sunscreen is suitable for daily use on infants’ sensitive skin, offering gentle defense against the sun’s rays
EASY APPLICATION: The hydrating mineral sunscreen is quick and easy to apply to even the most active babies, and protection begins instantly. The fast absorbing kids sun lotion won’t leave skin feeling oily or sticky, and has no unpleasant chemical scent.
CLEAN MINERAL FORMULA: The first baby mineral sunscreen to pass Whole Foods Premium Care requirements, Leaping Bunny certified sun creams contain no PABA, parabens, phthalates, BPA, oxybenzone, avobenzone, petroleum, gluten, dairy, or toxic chemicals.
WATER RESISTANT: Your baby can splash, swim and play in the water safely. Our children's and toddler sunscreen provides the highest water resistance per the FDA, offering babies continuous protection for up to 80 minutes in the pool or sea before the sunscreen should be re-applied.
SUNCARE BY THINK SUN: Thinkdaily, Thinkbaby, Thinkkids & Thinksports have got your family covered with gentle and reef-safe ingredient based clean sunscreen, made to be effective for delicate and sensitive skin without sacrificing protection

B07CGX34B2.product_name: Al Haramain Amber Oud Gold Edition - Arabian Perfume for Women and Men Unisex - Long Lasting Amber - 2 oz
B07CGX34B2.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Fragrance > Women's > Eau de Parfum
B07CGX34B2.description: Here's a full paragraph description: Al Haramain Amber Oud Gold Edition is a luxurious unisex fragrance that brings the opulence of Arabian perfumery to your everyday collection. This captivating scent opens with warm, rich amber that immediately envelops you in a golden aura of sophistication and mystery. At its heart lies precious oud — the legendary "liquid gold" of the Middle East — delivering deep, woody complexity that has been treasured for centuries. The fragrance unfolds beautifully on the skin, revealing layers of sweetness, warmth, and sensuality that work equally well on both women and men. What sets Amber Oud Gold Edition apart is its impressive longevity — this is a scent that stays with you from morning until night, leaving a trail of elegance wherever you go. Whether you're attending a special occasion, enjoying a romantic evening, or simply want to feel luxurious on an ordinary day, this fragrance transforms any moment into something extraordinary. This 2 oz bottle offers an accessible entry into the world of premium Arabian perfumes, proving that true luxury knows no boundaries of gender or geography.
features: Amber Oud Gold Edition EDP 60ML opens with a fresh, Zesty blend of bergamot and crisp green notes, offering a vibrant and refreshing start to this luxurious fragrance.

B0D3J4BT2L.description: Discover the allure of Eclaire, a sophisticated perfume that tempts the senses with a luscious blend of caramel, milk, and sugar at the top, enveloped by the delicate scent of white flowers and honey in its heart. The experience deepens with a warm base of vanilla, praline, and musk, making Eclaire an irresistible choice for those who cherish a touch of sweetness in their signature scent.

B0FG1QCM2B.product_name: Lattafa Habik – Spicy, Aromatic, Woody, Musky – Eau de Parfum Spray Long-Lasting Fragrance for Men, 3.4 Ounce / 100 ml
B0FG1QCM2B.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Fragrance > Men's > Eau de Parfum
B0FG1QCM2B.description: Lattafa Habik Eau de Parfum for Men is a bold and captivating fragrance that exudes strength and sophistication. It opens with a dynamic blend of cardamom, pepper, artemisia, and bergamot—creating a spicy-citrus introduction that is both fresh and invigorating. The heart unfolds with aromatic sage, soothing lavender, and a warm touch of cinnamon, adding depth and complexity. As the scent settles, a rich base of sandalwood, patchouli, tonka bean, amberwood, and musk delivers a smooth, earthy warmth that lingers elegantly. Perfect for the modern man, Habik is a powerful yet refined scent, ideal for both day and evening wear.
features: Bold & Charismatic Aromatic Fragrance: A refined fusion of spice, herbs, and woods that defines modern masculinity with depth and intensity

Fragrance Notes: Opens with Cardamom, Pepper, Artemisia, and Bergamot; evolves into heart notes of Sage, Lavender, and Cinnamon; settles into a warm base of Sandalwood, Patchouli, Tonka Bean, Amberwood, and Musk
Long-Lasting & Confident Wear: Perfect for evening occasions, cooler seasons, or anytime you want to leave a strong and sophisticated impression
Sleek & Masculine Bottle Design: Presented in a 3.4 oz flacon with dark, powerful aesthetics—an excellent gift or personal statement piece
