B0CLT7WFFY.product_name: Pacifica Silver Moon Vanilla Almond Spice Perfume – Warm Gourmand Clean Fragrance for Women, 2 fl oz (Vegan & Cruelty-Free)
B0CLT7WFFY.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Fragrance > Women's > Eau de Parfum
B0CLT7WFFY.description: Pacifica Silver Moon Perfume is a warm, dreamy vanilla fragrance that wraps you in coziness from the first spritz. Inspired by a serene moonlit night, this eau de parfum blends creamy vanilla with almond and a touch of spice to create a scent that's both comforting and captivating. Whether you're dressing up or winding down, Silver Moon adds a subtle sweetness and feminine warmth that draws compliments and uplifts your mood. Scent Profile: Imagine the delectable aroma of freshly baked vanilla cake mingling with a hint of spice – that's the essence of Silver Moon. Top notes of delicate white florals and vanilla orchid unfold into a heart of rich tonka bean, almond, and cardamom. A soft base of sandalwood, amber, and musk lingers on your skin, giving this perfume a creamy, mellow dry-down. The overall impression is a gourmand (edible-inspired) sweetness balanced by subtle woodsy spice, making it irresistible yet never overpowering. Clean Beauty & Quality: Like all Pacifica fragrances, Silver Moon is carefully crafted to be kind to you and the planet. This perfume is 100% vegan and cruelty-free, and it's free of harsh chemicals like parabens and phthalates. The gentle formula is dermatologist tested to be safe on sensitive skin, so you can spritz without worry. We use natural and essential oils to create authentic notes, allowing you to enjoy a luxury-quality scent without compromise. Each bottle is made with compassion for animals and respect for the environment, because we believe beauty should do no harm. Inspiration: The Silver Moon represents a time of transformation and inner strength. This fragrance was designed to capture that feeling of a calm night under a glowing moon. It's part of Pacifica's beloved Moon Moods collection, each scent inspired by the unique energy of different moon phases. Spray Silver Moon and embrace its meaning: a reminder to find calm, **renew your spirit**, and shine in your own phase of life. How to Wear: Silver Moon's warm vanilla and almond notes make it wonderfully versatile for any occasion. Spritz it on pulse points (wrists, neck) for an all-day subtle aura, or spray a little in your hair and on clothing for a longer-lasting trail. It’s perfect worn solo as your signature scent, and also layers beautifully with other perfumes or Pacifica body mists if you love to create a custom blend. (Try it with a floral scent to add a touch of bloom to the sweetness!) Because it's an eau de parfum, just 2-3 sprays are enough to last for hours. Who Will Love It: If you gravitate toward sweet, cozy perfumes or anything with a hint of gourmand (think vanilla, caramel, or almond desserts), Silver Moon will likely become your new obsession. Fans of vanilla fragrances and those looking for a **feminine perfume** that feels like a warm hug will adore this scent. It's an excellent choice for anyone seeking a non-toxic, clean perfume that still offers depth and character. From young perfume lovers to longtime fragrance enthusiasts, Silver Moon resonates with any age – whenever you want to feel comforted yet confident. Product Details: You will receive a 1.0 fl oz (30 mL) bottle of Pacifica Silver Moon Spray Perfume. The bottle is travel-friendly yet lasts a long time given the concentration of the fragrance (eau de parfum strength). As part of Pacifica’s commitment to better packaging, the component is recyclable. Crafted in the USA with globally sourced ingredients, Silver Moon is a feel-good fragrance inside and out – every spritz invites you to bask in a glow of warm vanilla bliss.
features: Enchanting Gourmand Aroma: Indulge in a cozy blend of creamy vanilla, toasted almond, and a hint of spice. Pacifica Silver Moon envelops you in a warm, sweet gourmand scent that’s both comforting and alluring. This feminine perfume captures the feeling of a soft cashmere blanket on a moonlit night – sweet and cozy but never overpowering. If you love vanilla perfumes that feel like a warm hug, Silver Moon will delight your senses with its inviting, dessert-like aroma.

FREE OF HARSH CHEMICALS Clean, Vegan & Cruelty-Free: Enjoy a truly clean fragrance made with natural and essential oils. Pacifica Silver Moon contains no parabens, phthalates, sulfates, or other harsh chemicals​. The gentle, non-toxic formula is dermatologist tested safe for sensitive skin, so you can spritz without worry. As a 100% vegan, cruelty-free perfume, Silver Moon aligns with your values – it’s hypoallergenic and eco-conscious without compromising on quality or scent longevity.

Long-Lasting Warmth: Don’t let the comforting softness fool you – this eau de parfum is designed to last from day to night. Just a few spritzes envelop your skin in an enduring vanilla-and-amber warmth. Its high concentration of fine fragrance oils (comparable to luxury perfumes) means Silver Moon’s delicious scent has serious staying power​. Feel confident that your cozy vanilla aroma will linger for hours, carrying you through busy days, date nights, and everything in between with ease.

Feminine & Versatile: Warm, sweet, and effortlessly elegant – Silver Moon is the perfect perfume for women who adore gourmand scents with a sophisticated twist. The blend of gourmand notes and subtle spice strikes a beautiful balance between playful and refined. Wear it as your daily signature scent for compliments at the office, or save it for evenings when you want a sensual, cozy fragrance on date night. Versatile and seasonless, it feels just as right cuddling up in winter as it does as a light sweet touch in summer, never heavy or cloying.

Inspired by the Moon: Part of Pacifica’s Moon Moods collection, Silver Moon is inspired by the magic of a silver moonrise – symbolizing shifts, change, and inner strength. Moon Mood: Vanilla for strength, Almond for grounding, Spice for regenerating. 🌙 Each spray uplifts your mood and adds a touch of mystique. The perfume comes in a travel-friendly 1 fl oz spray bottle, perfect for your bag or vanity. Made in the USA with thoughtfully sourced ingredients, it’s a feel-good fragrance you’ll love to wear and share.

B0973L1NVT.product_name: Freeman Flirty Feet Instant Foot Peeling Spray, Exfoliating Foot Mask For Summer, Moisturizing & Smooth Dry, Cracked Heels, Remove Dead Skin Quickly, Cruelty-Free & Vegan, 4 fl.oz./ 118 ml Bottle

B0973L1NVT.description: The Freeman Flirty Feet Coconut and Aloe Revitalizing & Softening Instant Peeling Foot Spray is the perfect way to take care of the skin on your feet. And it's super easy! All you have to do is spray on the Freeman foot spray to reveal instantly soft and supple feet. This foot peeling spray helps to gently exfoliate and visibly remove dead skin cells. Coconut and Aloe work together to help moisturize soles and heels for rejuvenated looking feet. Freeman products are vegan and cruelty-free. They're also free of parabens, sulfates, silicone, phthalates, and mineral oils. Since 1976, Freeman has created feel-good formulas that seriously work (without losing all the fun!). We believe skincare belongs to everyone and strive to democratize beauty with affordable products. In our minds, clear skin = a clear conscious. Our top priority is ensuring our products are efficacious and full of good-for-you ingredients. Our new formulas are always dermatologist tested, free of parabens, sulfates, phthalates and mineral oil. We love our furry friends, too, and are proudly cruelty-free and never test on animals. From breakouts and blemishes to sensitive and dull complexions, we’re here to educate you on how to take care of your unique skin. We believe skincare is more than a routine... It’s about feeling good from the inside out!
features: Freeman Flirty Feet Instant Foot Peeling Spray helps you achieve soft, supple feet in a matter of minutes- your summer skincare staple for pretty feet just in time for sandal season

Easy to use: Spray foot mask directly on to clean, dry feet then rub off dead skin- or use an exfoliating mitt for extra peeling effect. Finish by cleansing feet with soap and warm water, then pat to dry. Includes approximately 50 + applications per bottle
Achieve salon results weekly by using this viral foot spray on rough, dry heels, and cracked feet- save on monthly pedicures with this affordable, pain-free foot peel mask

Made with clean ingredients and no harsh chemicals- Freeman products are free of parabens, sulfates, silicone, phthalates, and mineral oils- Also 100% Cruelty Free and Vegan - Freeman products are never tested on animals

B06XYNHFF2.description: Keratin is the hardening protein that builds nails. This powerful keratin amino acids treatment absorbs into soft, weak nail layers to give them maximum strength, stopping peeling and chipping.
features: NAIL STRENGTHENER: Keratin is the hardening protein that builds nails. This powerful keratin amino acids treatment absorbs into soft, weak nail layers to give them maximum strength, stopping peeling and chipping.
3 DAY GROWTH: Grow healthier, harder, longer nails with visible improvement in as little as 3 days.
QUICK DRY: Dries quickly to an ultra-hard finish so you can go about your day without fear of ruining your manicure.
VERSATILE: Our Keratin 3 Day Growth can be used with nail color resulting in a long-wearing, high gloss manicure or can be used alone for a natural, healthy look with shine.

DIRECTIONS: Use alone. Apply 2 coats over dry, clean nails. Let each coat dry before applying another coat. Use with nail color: Apply as base & top coat. For longest-lasting protection, apply another coat every 3 days. Remove easily with nail polish remover.

B0DJWTK4C5.product_name: EDJY Fingernail Cutter - Precision Stainless Steel Nail Cutter for Fingernails | Sharp Blade, Ergonomic Design, Durable & Rust-Resistant | Ideal for Men and Women | EDJY Blue
B0DJWTK4C5.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Foot, Hand & Nail Care > Tools & Accessories > Nail Tools > Nail Clippers
B0DJWTK4C5.description:
ENGINEERED FOR FINGERNAILS: Dermatologist-designed with a compound curve that matches the natural shape of fingernails—EDJY is purpose-built for precision fingernail trimming, delivering a clean, accurate cut every time.
THE PERFECT LENGTH: Our patented safety stop prevents damaging your nails from cutting too short, protecting against infection and promoting healthier nails by leaving a doctor-recommended sliver of white.
SINGLE BLADE DESIGN: Crafted with a surgical-grade stainless steel blade for precise nail shaping, superior control, clean cuts, and a flawlessly smooth fingernail edge.
SUPERIOR MATERIALS: Constructed with martensitic stainless steel that's hardened to 60+ HRC, EDJY’s blade has the highest edge retention and rust resistance rating in the nail clipper industry.
ERGONOMIC ENGINEERING: Strategically positioned lever closer to the cutting point provides enhanced control with less force and more precision than traditional nail clippers.

B08FMN2S2R.product_name: 2PCS Natural Pumice Stone, Asqraqo Lava Pedicure Tools Hard Skin Callus Remover for Feet and Hands - Foot File Exfoliation to Remove Dead Skin, and Callusess
B08FMN2S2R.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Foot, Hand & Nail Care > Tools & Accessories > Foot Pumices
B08FMN2S2R.description:
Natural Pumice Stone: The use of pumice stones to remove calluses on the feet originated in ancient Greece. It's the healthiest and most natural way to care for your feet. It can not only give you the exfoliation, but also relieve fatigue
Easy to Use ＆ Handle: The ergonomic design makes the pumice stone easy to use and hold in your hand. Rope rings allow your stones to be hung to dry, which is an important part of maintaining pumice stones
Remove Callus In More Efficient Way: Asqraqo's Lava pumice is a kind of natural porous stone, which is mildly abrasive and forms a porous material. It can treat your feet through safe and natural lava and make your feet feel smooth
How to Use: Pumice stones should be used on moist skin, so it's best to soak your feet in warm water, while moisten the pumice stone with soapy water and then rub it in a circular motion over the area to remove calluses and dead skin
GREAT GIFT SET & SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: 2Pcs pumice stone included in the package, you can share it with your family or friends. If you’re not completely satisfied for ANY reason, contact us

B0D1W289B2.product_name: Davids Hydroxi Fluoride Free Nano Hydroxyapatite Toothpaste for Remineralizing Enamel & Sensitive Relief, Whitening, Antiplaque, SLS Free, Natural Peppermint, 4 oz, Made in USA
B0D1W289B2.description:
Features Hydroxi, our proprietary formulation of Nano Hydroxyapatite (n-HA) - the same ingredient that naturally makes up 97% of your teeth material, and carefully selected naturally sourced and naturally derived ingredients. We eliminated the fluoride and replaced it with this biocompatible ingredient to remineralize your enamel, reduce teeth sensitivity and naturally whiten.
Safe & Gentle Whitening – micro polishing agents gently remove surface stains to safely whiten without causing the sensitivity normally found with peroxide or other bleaching agents. RDA (abrasive rating) of 101 to effectively remove plaque and surface stains while being enamel safe for daily brushing. Safe range per ADA (American Dental Association).
Bioactive Sensitive Relief - most sensitive toothpastes uses Potassium Nitrate (nerve numbing drug) to temporarily numb the tooth nerves. We use Hydroxyapatite (n-HA) to reduce sensitivity by remineralizing the enamel and passageways (tubules) to the nerves.
Clean & Safe Ingredients – we use only premium ingredients derived from plants and the earth, with no animal by-products (vegan). Fluoride Free, Sulfate Free (no SLS), EWG VERIFIED. No Artificial Flavors, Colors, or Preservatives. Birch xylitol used to improve oral health.
Healthy Mouth – formulated to restore a healthy PH balance and support your mouth’s natural oral microbiome. Plaque is the main enemy of teeth and Davids is designed to aggressively stop plaque from forming and reduce existing plaque buildup, while leaving your mouth feeling minty fresh and exceptionally clean. Healthy mouth for a healthy you.

B00HFQQ0VU.product_name: Waterpik Aquarius Water Flosser For Teeth Cleaning, Gums, Braces, Dental Care, Electric Power With 10 Settings, 7 Tips For Multiple Users And Needs, ADA Accepted, White WP-660, Packaging May Vary
B00HFQQ0VU.breadcrumb: Health & Household > Oral Care > Dental Floss & Picks > Power Dental Flossers
B00HFQQ0VU.description: The Waterpik Aquarius water flosser features a compact, contemporary design and advanced water flossing technology for maximum performance. It comes with 7 flossing tips for a variety of dental needs and multiple users, a convenient one-minute timer with 30-second pacer to ensure thorough water flossing of all areas, and a removable water reservoir with 90+ seconds of flossing time. The special 360-degree rotating tip handle easily reaches your whole mouth, even back teeth. The Waterpik Aquarius water flosser removes up to 99.9% of plaque bacteria that causes gingivitis, cavities, and bad breath from treated areas and is clinically proven up to 2X as effective as string floss for removing bacterial plaque and improving gum health. Waterpik is the #1 water flosser brand recommended by dental professionals, and the Waterpik Aquarius water flosser is accepted by the American Dental Association (ADA) for safety and effectiveness. Backed by a 3-year manufacturer's limited warranty, see product manual for details.
features: ADVANCED WATER FLOSSING: Aquarius is a fully featured water flosser featuring enhanced pressure with 10 settings for a custom clean, massage mode for gum stimulation, plus a built-in timer/pacer pauses briefly at 30 secs and 1 min to track flossing time

EASY TO USE: Features a large reservoir for 90+ seconds of use, no refilling required. Small maneuverable flossing wand makes it easy to floss all areas including back teeth and includes a convenient water on/off switch

DENTIST RECOMMENDED: Waterpik is the #1 water flosser brand recommended by dental professionals and the first water flosser brand to earn the American Dental Association (ADA) Seal of Acceptance for safety and effectiveness

KEY FEATURES: 7 tips for multiple family members and needs, 10 safe and effective pressure settings, removable 22 oz reservoir (top-rack dishwasher safe for easy cleaning), 90+ secs floss time, 360 tip rotation, 120VAC/60Hz for use in North America only

PROVEN EFFECTIVE: Waterpik water flossers use PrecisionPulse technology to deliver a combination of water pressure and pulsations, removing up to 99.9 percent of plaque bacteria from treated areas that cause gingivitis, cavities, and bad breath
WARRANTY AND SUPPORT: Backed by a 3-year limited manufacturer’s warranty, see manual for details. Waterpik’s Colorado support team is available to help with any product questions or needs

B0758F8KDC.product_name: TheraBreath Healthy Gums Oral Rinse, Antigingivitis, Clean Mint Flavor, Dentist Formulated to Help Prevent Gingivitis and Support Gum Health, Alcohol Free, 16 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)
B0758F8KDC.description: Get the gum care you deserve with every swish of TheraBreath Healthy Gums Oral Rinse with a refreshing Clean Mint flavor. This alcohol-free, non-burning mouthwash helps reduce plaque that leads to bleeding gums and early gum disease. It’s formulated with CPC (Cetylpyridinium chloride), which is clinically shown to help fight gingivitis, an early form of gum disease. It provides gum care in an antiplaque, antigingivitis formula that helps fight gingivitis for 12 hours. TheraBreath Healthy Gums gingivitis mouthwash has no dyes, no colors, no SLS/sulfates, and no parabens. Adults and children 12 years or older can swish 4 teaspoons (20 mL) between teeth for 30 seconds two times a day. Do not use for children younger than 6 years of age. TheraBreath Healthy Gums Oral Rinse is not tested on animals and is certified gluten-free, vegan, Kosher, and Halal. It’s 100 percent guaranteed, so you can confidently add it to your oral care routine for a clean mouth. It’s swishy time with TheraBreath, the best-selling alcohol-free mouthwash brand in the USA (based on units sold, Circana, L13wks 2/2/25).
features: Two 16 fl oz bottles of TheraBreath Healthy Gums Oral Rinse in a Clean Mint flavor; this antigingivitis, antiplaque mouthwash is dentist formulated and alcohol free
TheraBreath Healthy Gums Oral Rinse is a non-burning mouthwash that helps reduce plaque that leads to bleeding gums and gingivitis, an early form of gum disease
Every swish of this TheraBreath mouth rinse in a refreshing Clean Mint flavor supports gum health in a formula that is certified vegan, gluten free, halal, and kosher, and has BPA-free packaging
This alcohol-free gingivitis mouthwash freshens your breath without the burn; it contains no dyes, no colors, no SLS/sulfates, and no parabens; and is not tested on animals

As part of your gum health routine to help prevent early gum disease, this mouthwash has a powerful CPC (Cetylpyridinium chloride) formula that kills bacteria linked to gum disease to help fight gingivitis for 12 hours
For best results, adults and children 12 years and older should vigorously swish 4 teaspoons (20 mL) of TheraBreath Healthy Gums Oral Rinse between teeth twice a day for 30 seconds and then spit out

B0FKB289VY.product_name: COSLUS Sonic Electric Toothbrush for Adults: 3 Intensities & 5 Modes Customized for Effective Yet Gentle Cleaning - 2 Types of Heads for Gentle or Daily Care, Travel & Family Home Use, Black, 1PC
B0FKB289VY.breadcrumb: Health & Household > Oral Care > Toothbrushes & Accessories > Powered Toothbrushes & Accessories > Powered Toothbrushes > Sonic
B0FKB289VY.description:
Next-Gen Sonic Technology for a Superior Clean: Developed by our research team over years of refinement, this advanced sonic electric toothbrush features a powerful motor and refined sonic technology. It is designed to deliver a thorough yet gentle clean, removing 10x more stains—cleans thoroughly even in hard-to-reach areas. With 5 cleaning modes & 3 intensity levels, it offers a customizable brushing experience to suit personal preferences, helping you feel clean and confident every day
Lasting Core, Not Extra Heads：Real value lies not in the quantity of accessories, but in a core that endures. Our sonic electric toothbrush is equipped with a genuine magnetic levitation motor, delivering 1000+ hours of durable, effective cleaning power. While some prioritize the number of accessories over long-lasting motors, we believe true investment lies in enduring performance that stands the test of time. With an IPX7 waterproof design, it is built to be more durable, safe for shower use
5 Modes & 3 Intensities for the Whole Family: The electric toothbrush is designed to be multi-user friendly for ages 12 and up. It features 5 cleaning modes & 3 intensity levels, creating a personalized cleaning experience tailored to all ages and oral conditions. Easily find a comfortable and effective setting for daily care, whether a gentle massage, a thorough clean, or something in between. The ergonomic, non-slip, and compact handle ensures easy grip for all users, from kids to seniors
2 Types of Upgraded Brush Head, 1 Outlasts 3 Ordinary：The sonic electric toothbrush features 2 hardness types of replacement brush heads to suit various needs for the whole family. Made with upgraded flexible food‑grade bristles that last 3+ months—ordinary nylon with under 1‑month lifespan—and 20% higher bristle density, it delivers double the cleaning efficiency. Advanced implant technology keeps fall‑out below 1%, while the end‑rounded, gentle, safe design ensures gentle yet thorough cleaning
Compact Travel Design with Long-Lasting Battery: The COSLUS electric travel toothbrush delivers up to twice the battery life of others, making it perfect for business trips, on-the-go use, post-meal cleaning, or office care. It features 2-hour fast DC charging (50% faster than standard) and lasts from 30 to 150 days depending on usage mode. The included brush head cap keeps it clean and compact for travel —no bulky storage case needed. Less charging, more moments of fresh cleanliness anywhere.

B0FMT8YXM5.description: Shark FacialPro Glow delivers instant and radiant glow with good-for-your-skin ingredients and FacialPro Glow technology for spa-level results you’ll love. Complete with the Shark DePuffi attachment for instant contrast hot + cold therapy to depuff & soothe.
features: Hydro-fueled extractions: Clinically tested to clear impurities from pores, reducing pore size and visibility in just one use*. Get spa-level exfoliation and reveal your true glow in just 10 minutes.

Expert formulas: Developed in Korea, dermatologist tested, esthetician approved. Derm Detox AHA+BHA Exfoliating Gel clears pores & reduces visibility in 1 use*. Hydro Infuse BHA Hydrator uses hyaluronic acid to boost hydration +128% in 1 treatment*.

Skin Barrier Support: Gently exfoliates with patented hydro-abrasion tips designed to support skin barrier repair for smoother skin after 1 use*. *Results from clinical study with 60 subjects' immediate use of treatment. Individual results may vary.

DePuffi: InstaChill depuffs under-eyes, sculpts and soothes redness. InstaHeat boosts circulation and supports lymphatic drainage. This instant contrast therapy attachment features 6 controlled temp-levels to prep and revive skin.

Safe Extractions: Our tip design ensures effective & safe extraction. Pull skin taught to use the Wide Tip on cheeks + forehead and the T-Zone tip on nose + chin. Get a good seal, apply pressure to hear a "kiss" when releasing the tip from the skin.

Continued Benefits: With weekly use of FacialPro Glow, see clinically-tested improvement in skin clarity, hydration, pore visibility, and texture*. *Results from a 4-week clinical study with 60 subjects and 1x/wk use. Individual results may vary.

B08KSRYGW4.product_name: Freebird FlexSeries Electric Head & Body Hair Shaver - Mens Cordless Rechargeable Wet/Dry Skull Bald Head Back & Groin Waterproof Razor with Rotary Blades, Clippers, Nose Trimmer, Brush, Massager
B08KSRYGW4.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Men's > Electric Shavers > Rotary Shavers
B08KSRYGW4.description:
SMOOTH SHAVE - Experience the number one benefit of this electric razor for men: a smooth shave. This high-quality electric shaver is designed for wet or dry use, with or without shaving cream. Its waterproof construction makes it extremely durable and shower-safe, perfect for grooming your head, body, and sensitive areas. The cordless design and long battery life, charged via rapid USB, provide ultimate convenience for travel.
FIVE ATTACHMENTS - The all-inclusive FlexSeries Electric Shaver for Men kit comes with 5 essential grooming attachments for before, during, and after shaving. The kit includes: a five-blade rotary shaving head, a precision clipper/trimmer with 3mm, 5mm, and 7mm safety guards for body hair, a nose & ear hair trimmer, a micro & plush skin exfoliation brush, and a deep cleansing massage pad. A rapid USB charging cable and a micro cleaning brush are also included.
EASY TO USE - The FlexSeries electric shavers for men are ergonomically designed for easy handling whether you're shaving your head, beard, body, or groin. It shaves right down to the skin without causing irritation such as bumps or cuts. Perfect for men who prefer a clean-shaven look but want to avoid the hassle of traditional razors. This versatile kit works as a full body shaver for men and also makes an excellent gift for your husband, partner, father, friend, or brother.
GET STARTED - Before your first use, fully charge your shaver for about 90 minutes. While charging, the unit will display a RED light; when ready to use, it will turn solid GREEN. Enjoy up to 90 minutes of cordless use. Replace the ScalpSafe rotary blade every 4 weeks, to maintain buttery smooth blade performance keeping them sharp and rust-free.

B006UZMXZY.product_name: DUO Brush-On Clear Lash Glue –Waterproof Strip Lash Adhesive with Vitamins A, C & E, Long Lasting Eyelash Glue, 0.18 oz, 1 Pack
B006UZMXZY.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Tools & Accessories > Makeup Brushes & Tools > Eye > False Eyelashes & Adhesives > Eyelash Adhesives
B006UZMXZY.description:
WORLD’S BEST-SELLING ADHESIVE, PERFECT LASH LOOK: This hypoallergenic and fast-drying adhesive dries clear, undetectable, waterproof, holds strip lashes securely in place and is easy to remove without damaging the natural lashes or irritating the eyes. Works best in all lash styles. Perfect for under lashes, beginners, natural and light colors, light density lashes, and feather lashes. No wonder why pros and lash lovers alike have made DUO the best-selling adhesive in the world for over 60 years
SECURES FAKE LASHES ALL DAY, ALL NIGHT: This lash glue makes sure that your falsies are always intact and stays perfectly aligned with your eye shape. It sets in second and is really strong to hold the lashes well for a long period of time, so you don't need to worry about your faux lashes falling off from your eyes. Save yourself from multiple lash touch-ups and get your faux lashes to stay all day, all night with DUO Brush On Strip Lash Adhesive, Clear!
MADE IN KOREA, CRUELTY-FREE, HYPOALLERGENIC: A hypoallergenic lash adhesive formulated with Vitamins A, C & E and is also latex-free, formaldehyde-free,100% cruelty-free and specially made in Korea. Its waterproof formula ensures long-lasting wear and gentle for contact lens wearers including those with sensitive eyes. Easy to use, doesn’t stick to skin and comes off easily when removing. Use this lash glue for a no-mess application to keep your falsies fresh, natural yet glamorous-looking!
DRIES CLEAR, INVISIBLE FAUX LASH ADHESIVE: DUO Brush On Strip Clear Lash Adhesive, Clear blends well with your eyelashes completing your eye makeup while giving your artificial lashes a more natural, sultry look. It dries clear to keep your eye makeup perfect all day without worrying about smudging, creasing, or having a white film on your eyelids. Simply brush on a thin line on the lash band, wait for 30 seconds, and apply to lash. Captivate everyone’s attention in less than a minute!
CONVENIENT, HANDY FAKE LASH ADHESIVE: With DUO Brush On Strip Lash Adhesive, applying lashes has never been easier and convenient. Features an ultra-thin brush for the seamless strip lashes application. One tiny drop is all you need to secure your entire lash, so this tube will surely last for a long time. It is easy to store and can be carried anywhere while traveling. The best value for money with its easy application, reasonable price, high-grade performance, portability and long shelf-life.

Long Lasting & Waterproof: Our freckle tattoos are made with waterproof ingredients that are waterproof and sweatproof to stay flawless all day long. Whether you're attending a party or any other event, our glitter patches will keep you glowing and radiant for a long time, giving you a gorgeous fairy look

Widely Use: Our glitter freckle tattoos are suitable for a variety of occasions including music festivals, parties, Halloween, Mardi Gras, friend gatherings, everyday wear, travel, beach, pool, selfies, photo shoots, gym, weddings, Christmas, costumes, festivals, cosplay, arts and crafts projects and more. Add your unique charm and let you shine confidently in all occasions

B079HHKH44.product_name: Milani Conceal + Perfect 2-in-1 Foundation + Concealer for a Flawless Complexion, Under Eye Corrector, Cover Redness and Imperfections, Waterproof and Sweatproof - Natural Beige
B079HHKH44.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Face > Foundation
B079HHKH44.description:
CONCEAL & PERFECT: Meet the hardest working multi-tasker in your cosmetics bag! Combat under eye circles, redness and other skin imperfections with our water-resistant, foundation + concealer in one perfecting step.
AVAILABLE IN 45 SHADES: Choose from 45 different long-lasting shades to find the one that best matches your skin tone and helps create a naturally flawless complexion.
CRUELTY-FREE BEAUTY: This lush, creamy rich formula applies evenly to perfect and conceal imperfections with a natural looking satin matte finish. Oil-free, medium-to-full coverage, long-wearing & water-resistant for a beautiful, even skin tone.
TIPS & TRICKS: One to two pumps is all you need to create a flawless canvas. Apply to clean, dry skin with even strokes and blend seamlessly into skin. This foundation can also be used with your favorite beauty blender or foundation brush for a silky-smooth finish.
WE ARE MILANI: Born in East LA, we've always been connected to the rich diversity of our neighborhood, because it’s a place that truly embodies the melting pot of Los Angeles. We're not inspired by couture and top models. Our passion is real people, living real lives. Beauty is for everyone. No matter who you are or where you come from, we're here to fuel your self-expression with makeup for every shade, attitude, and ethnicity. No judgment. No exceptions.

Makeup That Lasts - The long-lasting formula of our shadow palettes contain a unique combination of softer powders which adheres easily, gives a soft focus effect, and blends smoothly and evenly.

B0CDGT49XH.product_name: 30 Pairs Lip Mask & Eye Mask, 24K Gold Crystal Gel Collagen Under Eye Patches, Lip Mask Skincare, Small Gifts, Bachelorette Party Favors, Valentines Day Gifts, Bulk Gifts, Galentines Day Party Favors
B0CDGT49XH.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Lip Care > Balms & Moisturizers
B0CDGT49XH.description:
【Value Bulk Gifts Set】15 Collagen Crystal Lip Mask + 15 24K Gold Eye Mask. The cooling sensation stimulates and regenerates skin cells, improving dry, dull lips and reducing fine lines around the eyes while minimizing dark circles and lip lines.
【Plant Extracts, Anti-Wrinkle Benefits】The new lip and eye mask contain multiple plant fruit extracts. The powerful combination of refreshing Vitamin C essence and 24K gold deeply repairs lips, soothes and calms skin, and firms and lifts the skin.
【Natural Collagen】Collagen crystal lip and eye mask gradually dissolve upon contact with body temperature, rapidly penetrating each pore to enhance skin nutrition and hydration. Consistent use yields remarkable results. (Note: Due to moisturizing ingredients, the lip mask may slip off during use. It is recommended to apply while lying down)
【Simple Lip Mask Application】After cleansing the lip and eye areas, peel and apply to the eye contour and lips. Leave on for 15-20 minutes (lying down recommended). Remove once the essence is fully absorbed—no rinsing needed. Gently massage the eye area to ensure complete absorption (concave side outwards, smooth side against lips)
【Suitable for All Skin Types】This neutral, gentle gel eye and lip mask features a hypoallergenic formula for a comfortable skincare experience. Suitable for men and women of all skin types, it effectively addresses lip dryness, loss of elasticity, and fine lines around the lips!

B00ADSC3TK.product_name: Serious Skincare INSTA-TOX Instant Wrinkle Smoothing Serum - Facial Filler Improves Appearance of Lines, Pores & Deep Wrinkles - Temporary Skin Tightener - Face Firming - .75 Fl Oz (2Pack)

B00ADSC3TK.description:
REDUCE THE APPEARANCE OF WRINKLES, FINE LINES, UNDER-EYE BAGS, DARK CIRCLES, CROW'S FEET, FOREHEAD & ELEVEN LINES, SMILE LINES. Serious Skincare INSTA-TOX Facial Firming Wrinkle Smoothing Serums original and proprietary formula creates a temporary tightening layer on your skin that tightens, lifts and smooths the skin for a more youthful appearance
INSTANT RESULTS. Our fast absorbing INSTA-TOX Facial Firming Wrinkle Smoothing Serum delivers instantly remarkable results with visible reduction of wrinkles, fine lines, under-eye bags, dark circles, crow's feet and other signs of aging on the face and neck. QUICK ABSORBING FORMULA. See results in three minutes! LONG LASTING RESULTS. The temporary reduction in facial lines and wrinkles last up to 12 hours.
HELPS YOUR SKIN LOOK REMARKABLY SMOOTHER AND YOUNGER. MINIMIZE THE APPEARANCE OF ENLARGED PORES. SAFE FOR USE AROUND THE EYE AREA. Enhance the appearance of your brow area, crow’s feet and frown lines in the eye area. INSTRUCTION PHAMPLET INCLUDED for you to achieve optimal results. For BEST RESULTS, please read the entire instructions for use pamphlet included in the Insta-Tox package. For sensitive skin, perform a small patch test prior to full face/neck usage.
SHAKE THE TUBE! Prior to each use, you must shake the tube. For BEST RESULTS, please read the entire instructions for use pamphlet included in the Insta-Tox package and watch our tutorial video at top, left of page on how to apply Insta-Tox. For sensitive skin, we suggest performing a small patch test prior to full face/neck usage.
TROUBLESHOOTING TIPS: If whiteness or residue appear, this just means too much INSTA-TOX has been applied. Simply smooth out area with a damp fingertip and allow to dry. In addition to reading the instruction pamphlet we also recommend watching our video to learn how to apply Insta-Tox. If product is delivered in freezing temperatures, set tube on countertop & allow product to come to room temperature prior to opening and using. Packaging may vary.
